GR14bhrgus_u:6117: dhvajaṃ tālonnataṃ sthāpya garbhagehe tu pūjayet // BhS_27.316 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6122: utsavādau pravṛtte tu uktadoṣe tvayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6127: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇudaivatyaṃ gāruḍaṃ dhvājameva ca // BhS_27.321 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6131: tatra dīpaṃ samāropya na labhetphalamavyayam // BhS_27.323 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6132: dhvaje dīpaṃ samāropya vaiṣṇavaṃ śataśo yajet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6136: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ dhvājameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6137: gāruḍaṃ daśaśo hutvā pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_27.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6141: bherītāḍanahīne ca raudraṃ ca vyāhṛtīstathā // BhS_27.328 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6144: eṣa eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ prāyaścittaṃ samācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:6145: āropite tu garuḍe hīne caiva nivedane // BhS_27.330 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6146: vaiṣṇavaṃ dhvaṃmetrau ca hutvā gāruḍameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6148: mudgānne tu tathā hīne vaiṣṇavaṃ vāyudaivatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:6150: hutvā yatnena bahuśo maudgikaṃ ca nivedayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6158: gāruḍaṃ dhvajamantraṃ ca sahastaṃ caiva hūyatām /
GR14bhrgus_u:6159: tataśśeṣaṃ samāpyeta viparītaṃ na kārayet // BhS_27.337 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6161: śāntiṃ pūrvoditāṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_27.338 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6165: apramāṇaṃ paṭaṃ gṛhya mahāśāntiṃ samācaret // BhS_27.340 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6167: hīne tu cotsavāraṃbhasnapane vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_27.341 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6168: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca vāruṇaṃ caiva hūyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:6170: hīne kautukabandhe tu vaiṣṇavaṃ śāntameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6171: saudarśanaṃ ca hutvā tu kautukaṃ bandhayetpunaḥ // BhS_27.343 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6173: vaiṣṇavaṃ pāvakaṃ bhūmidaivatyaṃ ca hunedbudhaḥ // BhS_27.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6177: prātarbaliṃ tu nirvāpya hīne nityotsave tathā // BhS_27.346 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6179: sāyaṃ kuryādutsavaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kārayetkramāt // BhS_27.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6186: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā dviguṇaṃ tu baliṃ dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6187: brahmaṇaśca digīśānāṃ balidānaṃ tu naityikam // BhS_27.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6188: adāne niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā pūrvoktaṃ ṣaḍguṇaṃ baliḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6191: prathamaṃ vāstuśuddhissyādya vai dīyate baliḥ // BhS_27.353 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6195: antaśśace vāstuni tu na balibhramaṇaṃ caret // BhS_27.355 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6198: akāle tu baliṃ datvā kāle tu triguṇaṃ baliḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6201: na hi śraddhotsave doṣamuśantyenaṃ sa hītaraḥ // BhS_27.358 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6204: kṛtvā sīmāṃ viniścitya tataḥ kāryaṃ samācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:6207: devādīnāṃ balaṃ yasmādvardhate sa balissmṛtaḥ // BhS_27.361 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6216: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā sarvatra dviguṇaṃ baliḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6217: devatāvāhanaṃ yatra deśeprāk kriyate tataḥ // BhS_27.366 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6219: maṇḍalaṃ ca jalaṃ kūrcamāhvānādhāra ucyate // BhS_27.367 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6221: balidānaṃ tu guptaṃ syānna tatbaśyantyavaidikāḥ // BhS_27.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6225: balidravye 'tha vā pātre patite bhūtale tathā // BhS_27.370 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6226: bhinne naṣṭe ca pūrvoktaṃ hutvānyaṃ balimāharet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6227: balidānaṃ tu kṛtvaiva bhutapīṭhe kṣipettataḥ // BhS_27.371 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6228: baliśeṣamanukte tu sthāne buddhyā tu nirvapet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6229: vaiṣṇavaṃ cākṣahamanuṃ vaiṣvakcenaṃ ca gāruḍam // BhS_27.372 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6230: saudarśanaṃ ca hutvaiva bhūtapīṭhe bali kṣipet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6232: śāntiṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ hutvā tathābhyarcya nivedayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6233: yathoktahome hīne tu vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktakam // BhS_27.374 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6237: nṛsūktaṃ sāntamantrau ca gāruḍaṃ cākrameva ca // BhS_27.376 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6239: devālaṅkaraṇe hīne śrīdaivatyaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam // BhS_27.377 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6241: alaṅkāreṣu dravyeṣu niryāsaṃ candanaṃ sumam // BhS_27.378 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6244: nṛtte geye 'tha vā hīne vaiṣṇavaṃ rudradaivatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:6245: stotrahīne tathā brāhmaṃ hutvā sārasvataṃ tataḥ // BhS_27.380 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6247: vaiṣṇavaṃ śāntadaivatyaṃ hīne picchādike tathā // BhS_27.381 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6249: yānātkāle yāgaśālāṃ deve na pratigacchati // BhS_27.382 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6251: dhruvārcanaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ na tatrāsti vyatikramaḥ // BhS_27.383 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6257: atra pramādetu bhavetpūrvoktaiva hi niṣkṛtiḥ // BhS_27.386 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6259: carennityaṃ viśuddhātmā viparīte tu doṣakṛt // BhS_27.387 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6260: dīkṣāṅgasya tu vastrasya tathā pratisarasya vā /
GR14bhrgus_u:6265: atha vā mocanaṃ kuryādite ke cidvadantihi // BhS_27.390 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6267: pratiṣṭhānte tu sā dīkṣā bhavedutsavasaṃgatā // BhS_27.391 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6272: dīkṣite vartamāne tu nānyaṃ tatra praveśayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6275: kṣatāni vā bhaveyustaṃ visṛjyānyena kārayet // BhS_27.395 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6276: na tasya tu bhaveddīkṣā mahāśāntiṃ tu kārayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6277: sa dīkṣito bhavedeva pūrvasya pkaṇidhissa hi // BhS_27.396 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6280: ādau madhye tadhānte ca hīne brāhmaṇabhojane /
GR14bhrgus_u:6281: trivākaṃ tu mahāśāntiṃ hutvā brāhmaṇabhojanam, // BhS_27.398 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6287: yānāttu patite deve śīghramuddhṛtya sādaram // BhS_27.401 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6289: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ sahitaṃ kramāt // BhS_27.402 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6293: tattadrūpaṃ tu saṃsmṛtya samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ // BhS_27.404 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6295: patane tu tathaiteṣāmuddhṛtyaiva ca pūrvavat // BhS_27.405 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6297: yānāttu patite biṃbe hīnāṅge doṣagaurave // BhS_27.406 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6299: dhruvabere samāropya taccaktiṃ vidhinā tataḥ // BhS_27.407 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6303: berāntarasyālābhe tu ratnaṃ vā kāñcanaṃ tathā // BhS_27.409 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6304: nyasya pātre samāvāhya samabhyarcya dine dine /
GR14bhrgus_u:6309: vādakānāṃ tu patanai brāhmaṃ raudraṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.412 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6310: ācāryādīnāṃ tu patane saṃkṣobhe ca tathākṛte /
GR14bhrgus_u:6311: ārṣabhaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tadvaddhvajādīnāṃ ca pātane // BhS_27.413 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6312: dhvājaṃ ca vāruṇaṃ caiva vāyavyaṃ ca hunedvidhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6315: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca śrībhūdaivatyameva ca // BhS_27.415 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6323: vaiṣṇapaṃ cāgnidaivatyaṃ brāhmaṃ raudraṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.419 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6328: vīthyāṃ cenmarahaṇādautu tacchīghraṃ tu vyapohya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6340: nṛsūktaṃ pārṣadaṃ caiva hutvā viprāṃstu bhojayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6341: tīrthāhātpūrvarātrau tu hīne kautuka bandhane // BhS_27.428 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6342: śayane vā vaiṣṇavaṃ ca śrībhūdaivatyameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6343: saudarśanaṃ ca hutvānte yathoktaṃ tu samācaret // BhS_27.429 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6344: tīrthasnāne tu kālasyātīte hīne ca vaiṣmavam /
GR14bhrgus_u:6345: vāruṇaṃ skandadaivatyaṃ hutvā cauktaṃ samācaret // BhS_27.430 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6347: gāruḍaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ hutvā deveśaṃ prārthayedguruḥ // BhS_27.431 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6355: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ ca tathaiva ca // BhS_27.435 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6358: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:6367: kṣipraṃ vastreṇa saṃśodya mārjayitvā kuśena ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6372: prathamāvaraṇe viṣṭe cārcāsthāne ca parṣadām // BhS_28.6 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6374: hutvā ca vāstu yajñeva pañcagavyaissamukṣya ca // BhS_28.7 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6376: dauvārikamanuṃ caiva dvārapālaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam // BhS_28.8 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6379: arcākāne tu dṛṣṭeṣu caiteṣu vidhinā harim /
GR14bhrgus_u:6388: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ raudrameva ca // BhS_28.14 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6394: mahāśāntiṃ ca hutvaiva pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_28.17 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6396: pañca gavyaiśca śuddhodairdevaṃ saṃsnāpya cādarāt // BhS_28.18 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6400: saptāhaṃ mahatīṃ śāntiṃ hutvābjāgnau vidhānataḥ // BhS_28.20 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6404: hutvā tu mahatīṃ śāntiṃ saṃsnāpya kalaśairvibhum // BhS_28.22 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6406: patite caiva pāṣaṇḍe cānyatantreṇa dīkṣite // BhS_28.23 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6407: praviṣṭe garbhagehe tu vāstuśuddhiṃ vidhāya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6408: hutvā tu mahatīṃ śāntiṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_28.24 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6410: dvitīye vā saṃcaratsu māse 'tīte viśeṣataḥ // BhS_28.25 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6416: sarvatra śuddhiṃ kṛtvātu hutvā māsatrayaṃ tataḥ // BhS_28.28 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6429: ekāhaṃ tu mahāśāntiṃ hutvā saṃsnāpya caudakaiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6431: spṛṣṭeṣu cātha biṃbeṣu kautukādiṣu vā dhruve /
GR14bhrgus_u:6434: gauravaṃ lāghavaṃ jñātvā sarvamūhyaiva kārayet // BhS_28.37 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6436: sparśane caiva biṃbānāṃ kṛtvā paryagni pūrvavat // BhS_28.38 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6438: prokṣaṇaiḥ prokṣyanityāgnau chullyāṃ vā vaiṣṇavaṃ hunet // BhS_28.39 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6442: chedane tāḍane caiva raktasrāve mṛtau tathā // BhS_28.41 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6444: vāstuhomaṃ ca hutvaiva kalaśaissnāpya saptabhiḥ // BhS_28.42 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6448: devaṃ śuddhodakaissnāpya śāntiṃ hutvā vidhānataḥ // BhS_28.44 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6450: deveśasya śave dṛṣṭe saṃsnāpya kalaśairharim // BhS_28.45 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6454: vāstuhomaṃ ca hutvā tu śaddhodairabhiṣicya ca // BhS_28.47 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6456: prasvede rudhirasrāve rodane jalpane tathā // BhS_28.48 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6457: hāse dṛṣṭe mahābere satsu dhūmādiṣu svataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6460: hutvā saṃsnāpya deveśaṃ kalaśaissaptabhiḥ kramāt // BhS_28.50 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6466: vimāne tu haṭhādbhinne patite vā vidhānataḥ // BhS_28.53 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6467: śāntiṃ māsatrayaṃ hutvā karṣaṇādi vidhāya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6468: bālālayaṃ ca saṃkalpya kṛtvā cāpsvadhivāsanam // BhS_28.54 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6476: prabhūtaṃ tu nivedyaiva hutvā śāntiṃ vidhānataḥ // BhS_28.58 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6478: sthūpikīle vinaṣṭe tu vimānopari saṃsthite // BhS_28.59 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6480: akāśe pratisūryasya darśane vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_28.60 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6484: akāle śaśinaḥ pūrtaukṣaye vā pratidarśane // BhS_28.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6485: mahotpāte ca mahatīṃ hutvā śāntiṃ vidhānataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6488: raktastrīdarśanecaivaṃ taṃ deśaṃ pariśodhya ca // BhS_28.64 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6490: dhruvabere kautukādau spṛṣṭe caiva dhruvoditām // BhS_28.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6492: garbhālaye tu sarpādidarśane tadvyapohya ca // BhS_28.66 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6496: sarpādau tu mṛte tatra tadvyapauhyopalipya ca // BhS_28.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6500: dhruvādiṣu tu biṃbeṣu muhusspṛṣṭeṣu taistathā // BhS_28.70 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6503: mṛte prāsādabāhye tu tadvyapohya ca pūrvavat /

GR14bhrgus_u:6505: pākasthāne gopurādau mṛte sarpe vyapohya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6506: upalipya ca nityāgnau vaiṣṇavaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_28.73 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6510: saṃsmāpya kalaśairdevaṃ vāstuhomaṃ vidhāya ca // BhS_28.75 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6514: prājāpatyaṃ ca hutvaiva brāhmaṇān bhojayedvidhiḥ // BhS_28.77 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6518: śucau deśe sugupte tu khanitvā cāvaṭaṃ ghanam // BhS_28.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6520: avaṭe 'bhyarcya bhūdevī “mapo hi'ṣṭheti prokṣya ca // BhS_28.80 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6524: hariśyā sahita statra śayīdhā' iti sanmanum // BhS_28.82 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6526: berābhāve tu hṛdaye samāropya vidhānataḥ // BhS_28.83 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6530: avaṭaṃ sikatābhirvā mṛdā vā pūrva yatnataḥ // BhS_28.85 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6532: paścādabhyantaraṃ gatvā devadevaṃ praṇamya ca // BhS_28.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6538: kūrcaṃ tu biṃbavatsmṛtvā manasaivākṣarāṇi tu // BhS_28.89 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6540: snapanādau tu saṃprāpte kuryādabhyukṣaṇaṃ budhaḥ // BhS_28.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6550: bhāgonnatāṃ yathālobhonna tāṃ dhānyairvidhāya ca // BhS_28.95 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6551: vediṃ manoharāṃ caiva vāsāṃsyāstīrya pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6560: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_28.100 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6564: ṣaṇmāne samatīte tu hutvā śāntiṃ viśeṣataḥ // BhS_28.102 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6566: viṣṇusūktaṃ ca pratyekaṃ śataśo juhuyādvidhiḥ // BhS_28.103 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6573: snātvā prabhāte deveśaṃ praṇamya praṇavena tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:6583: pauruṣaṃ cātmasūktaṃ ca japtvā dhyātvā vidhānataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6584: dhruvādvā hṛdayācchaktiṃ praṇidhyāṃ tu niveśya ca // BhS_28.112 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6595: teṣāṃ punaḥpratiṣṭhā cettattaddhomaṃ tu ke cana /
GR14bhrgus_u:6598: mahābere vimāne ca patite jarite tathā // BhS_28.119 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6608: bāhye caiva vimānasya cāṅgopāṅgakṣatau tathā // BhS_28.124 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6610: vinā bālālayasthānaṃ śaktiṃ gṛhya vimānagām // BhS_28.125 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6618: tasya kāle 'pyatīte tu tadā tatra na doṣakṛt // BhS_28.129 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6620: kṛtvā tasya tu saṃskāraṃ yathoktaṃ tatpunaścaret // BhS_28.130 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6622: vimāne ca tathā duṣṭe kṛtvā bālālayaṃ punaḥ // BhS_28.131 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6626: alābhe kautukādīnāṃ doṣayukte tu dārave // BhS_28.133 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6628: tadberaṃ vidhivattyaktvā kṛtvā mūlālaye punaḥ // BhS_28.134 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6630: bālālayasya saṃsthānaṃ vakṣye mūlālayasya tu // BhS_28.135 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6635: ekādi tu trihastāntaṃ vistāraṃ tu vidhīyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:6636: adhyardhaṃ caiva pādonamutsedhaṃ dviguṇaṃ tu vā // BhS_28.138 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6638: bhittyuccaṃ dvyaṃśamatha ca dvyaṃśaṃ tu śikharaṃ matam // BhS_28.139 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6641: dviguṇaṃ caturguṇaṃ kṛtvā yacchiṣṭaṃ vidhinā kṛtam /
GR14bhrgus_u:6644: nālīgṛhaṃ maṇḍapena pramukhe rahitaṃ tu vā // BhS_28.142 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6645: sahite tu samaṃ kuryāttripādaṃ cārdhameva vā /
GR14bhrgus_u:6648: pañcaviṃśatibhāgaṃ tu kṛtvā garbhālayaṃ tataḥ // BhS_28.144 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6649: madhye brāhmaṃ padaṃ caikaṃ parito 'ṣṭau tu daivikam /
GR14bhrgus_u:6650: mānuṣaṃ tasya paritaḥ padānyanyāni ṣoḍaśa // BhS_28.145 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6652: daivike mānuṣe sthāpya madhyamaṃ cādhamaṃ bhavet // BhS_28.146 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6664: pañcatrīnathavai kāgniṃ saṃkalpyaiva ca pūrvavat.// BhS_28.152 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6781: tattadaṅgasamutpattiṃ yuktyā takṣṇā tu kārayet // BhS_29.13 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6791: sahitaṃ rahitaṃ vātha devībhyāṃsthāpya cārcayet // BhS_29.18 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6795: yathā tathā prakalpyaiva vimānaṃ kautukaṃ punaḥ // BhS_29.20 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6801: devībhyāṃ sahitaṃ devaṃ daivikāṃśe vidhāya ca // BhS_29.23 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6823: samādāya vidhānena mālikāyāṃ tu maṇḍape // BhS_29.34 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6829: paścācca varṇalepādīn kṛtvā saṃśodya caivahi // BhS_29.37 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6841: paścāttale tu nirduṣṭe kautukādīn pragṛhya ca // BhS_29.43 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6854: vāruṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva prakṣipyaiva ca tajjale /

GR14bhrgus_u:6857: devyādīnāṃ parṣadāṃ ca tattanmantraṃ savaiṣṇavam // BhS_29.51 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6865: tatropāṅgasya hīne tu kuṃbhaṃ saṃsādhya pūrvavat // BhS_29.55 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6866: āvāhya kuṃbhe tacchaktiṃ biṃbaṃ saṃdhāya pūrvavat /

GR14bhrgus_u:6877: bhūmau pidhāya tadberaṃ tadūrdhve juhuyātkramāt // BhS_29.61 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6879: uddhṛtya biṃbaṃ prakṣālya pañcagavyaiḥ kuśodakaiḥ // BhS_29.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6884: paṭe kuḍye 'tha vā likhya bere vidhivadarcite /
GR14bhrgus_u:6887: ācāryeṇa ca yenādau karṣaṇādyāḥ kṛtāḥ kriyāḥ // BhS_29.66 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6905: pūrvaṃ tu yogamārgeṇa pratiṣṭhāpyārcite punaḥ // BhS_29.75 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6906: devībhyāṃ saha paścāttu kārayet sthāpanaṃ yadi /

GR14bhrgus_u:6913: śayane nāsanaṃ caiva sthānakaṃ kārayedvidhiḥ // BhS_29.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6916: snapanaṃ baliberaṃ ca sthitaṃ sarvatra kārayet /

GR14bhrgus_u:6926: saṃkṣobho jāyate sadyo vināśo bhavati dhruvam /
GR14bhrgus_u:6929: saṃpūjya vaiṣṇavān śaktyādatvā vai bhūridakṣiṇām // BhS_29.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6931: saptāhaṃ tu mahāśāntiṃ hutvā vipraśataṃ tathā // BhS_29.88 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6933: ṣaṇmāse samatīte tu ramate tatra nohariḥ // BhS_29.89 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6970: teṣu garbhakṛhe caiva pīṭhe caiva bhavāni tu /

GR14bhrgus_u:6974: adhiṣṭhāne ca pāde ca prastare ca gale 'pi ca /

GR14bhrgus_u:6983: rudrālaye tu sarveṣāṃ nṛpasya tu guhālaye // BhS_29.114 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7002: bhaumeṣu tu careṣvatra nimittaṃ ca nimittinam /

GR14bhrgus_u:7005: jvalane ca tathā devaṃ saṃsthāpya taruṇālaye // BhS_29.125 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7007: śāntiṃ kṛtvā punaḥ kuryātthsāpanaṃ cārcanaṃ kramāt // BhS_29.126 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7019: ālipya śarkarāṃ kuryāc chāntiṃ divyapracoditām // BhS_29.132 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7048: sthaṇḍile dhānyarāśiṃ tu kṛtvā tasya ca madhyame /

GR14bhrgus_u:7056: ratnāni hema rajataṃ tāmraṃ kāṃsyaṃ tathā trapu /

GR14bhrgus_u:7077: hutvānte tu ghṛtenaiva vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktakam // BhS_29.161 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7091: dakṣiṇāṃ bahulāṃ dadyājjīvo yajñasya dakṣiṇā // BhS_29.168 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7107: hemapātre tu sannyasya devamāvāhya tatra ca // BhS_29.176 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7123: dine dine pūrayitvā kuṃbhaṃ tenaiva secayet // BhS_29.184 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7141: tantunā veṣṭite kṣīraṃ kṛhītvākarake pūnaḥ // BhS_29.193 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7182: saptāhaṃ vā navāhaṃ vā dvādaśārṇena vai pṛthak /

GR14bhrgus_u:7211: abhyarcya devadeveśaṃ saṃpūjyaiva tu vaiṣṇavān // BhS_30.13 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7265: namaste viṣṇave tubhyaṃ puruṣāya namo namaḥ // BhS_30.40 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7276: mātā tvaṃ me pitā tvaṃ me bhrātā tvaṃ me sakhāmama /

GR14bhrgus_u:7279: tvāmeva śaraṇaṃ pāpya nistaranti manīṣiṇaḥ // BhS_30.47 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7280: na hi te gopya te kiñcinna hyantyaviditaṃ tava /

GR14bhrgus_u:7282: na te rūpaṃ na karaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsti te 'nagha /

GR14bhrgus_u:7285: tvatto me mānasaṃ janma prathamaṃ dvijapūjitam // BhS_30.50 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7286: vijñānaṃ tadidaṃ prāptaṃ brahmatvaṃ ca yadārjitam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7287: sarvaṃ tava kaṭākṣasya leśo 'yaṃ madhusūdana // BhS_30.51 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7289: avedavihitassargo mayā kartuṃ na śakyate // BhS_30.52 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7297: sa vibhuḥ procyate brahmā vikhanā brahmavādibhiḥ // BhS_30.56 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7303: dakṣaṃ marīcinaṃ nīlalohitaṃ bhṛgumena ca // BhS_30.59 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7307: vedānāṃ vyasanādarpāk prāgrūpaṃ militaṃ tu yat // BhS_30.61 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7309: nāmnā vikhanasaṃ prāhuryaṃ ca śātātapaṃ tathā // BhS_30.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7311: tathā vasiṣṭhodakṣaśca nava brahmāṇar iritā // BhS_30.63 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7316: ke cidgṛhyāṇi vai cakrurgṛhyaśrautātmakāni tu // BhS_30.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7317: dharmaśāstrāṇi kecittu purāṇāni ca ke cana /
GR14bhrgus_u:7320: vāṅmayaṃ sakalaṃ sarvaṃ śāstrabaddhaṃ pracakrire // BhS_30.67 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7324: cakre ṛgādibhedaistu vyasitvā tu pṛthak pṛthak // BhS_30.69 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7325: ādikāle tu bhagavān brahmātu vikhanā muniḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7330: vede vaikhānase sūtre yo dharmaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // BhS_30.72 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7340: yathā vedeṣu sarveṣu sāmavedaḥ praśasyate // BhS_30.77 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7344: adhīteṣu ca vedeṣu sāṃgeṣu labhate phalam // BhS_30.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7347: te sarve sūtramāśritya cainaṃ gacchanti mādhavam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7352: yasminneva tu saṃprokte sūtre vikhanasā purā // BhS_30.83 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7356: kiṃ bahūktena vidhinā sarvaṃ vaikhānasaṃ jagat // BhS_30.85 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7358: tadvaikhānaḥ paraṃ brahma iti vedādadhīmahi // BhS_30.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7368: dvijeṣu brāhmāṇāśśreṣṭhā brāhmaṇeṣu ca caiṣṇavāḥ // BhS_30.91 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7370: vaiṣṇavīṃ pratimāṃ loke vipraṃ vaikhānasaṃ tathā // BhS_30.92 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7371: gaṅgāṃ viṣṇupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate mūlamasyāpi śāstrasya /
GR14bhrgus_u:7372: sārdhakoṭipramāṇataḥ upādiśatsa bhagavān asmabhyaṃ naimiśe vane //
GR14bhrgus_u:7375: pūjānte snapanānte ca tathānte cotsavasya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7379: tīrthaṃ gṛhītuṃ prathamcchetsa patati dhruvam yaḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:8154: madhye śikhāyāstasyāśca jyotiḥ prajvalitaṃ mahat // BhS_33.26 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8160: hṛdi tiṣṭhati sarvātmā śrībhūmibhyāṃ ca pārṣadaiḥ // BhS_33.29 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8171: uktā guṇā na śakyante vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi /
GR14bhrgus_u:8174: mudhaiva jihvā kṛṣṇeti keśaveti na vakṣyati // BhS_33.36 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8176: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ keśavārpitam // BhS_33.37 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8186: tadāpnoti paraṃ brahmakleśena mahatāpi ca // BhS_33.42 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8194: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sahitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:8201: svayaṃvyaktaṃ ca divyaṃ ca saiddhaṃ paurāṇameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:8202: pauruṣaṃ ceti kathitaṃ sthalānāṃ pañcakaṃ budhaiḥ // BhS_34.3 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8206: na cāpi karṣaṇaṃ nāpi biṃbaśuddhyādikāḥ kriyāḥ // BhS_34.5 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8212: arcayāmo jagadyonimahamanye ca te trayaḥ // BhS_34.8 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8216: yādṛśīvartate pūjā yā biṃbānāṃ ca saṃsthitiḥ // BhS_34.10 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8217: na kiṃ cittāmatikramya pūrvoktāṃ tu samācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:8223: yanmāyāmohitaṃ sarvaṃ yasyāntaṃ ke 'pi no viduḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8224: tasya devasya māhātmyaṃ vaktuṃ śaknoti ko bhuvi // BhS_34.14 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8225: yadyadā caritaṃ tatra tatsarvaṃ śāstrameva hi /
GR14bhrgus_u:8228: śrutismṛtī ubhetasya paramājñāṃ vadanti hī // BhS_34.16 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8232: na hyatra sādhanāpekṣā svayaṃnyaktastato varaḥ // BhS_34.18 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8236: sarve te phalakāmāssyurve prapadyante yathā harim // BhS_34.20 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8238: phalārthino yadā devāḥ pratiṣṭhyāpya hariṃ kramāt // BhS_34.21 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8245: punāti parito deśaṃ nātra saṃdeha iṣyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:8247: na hi devāssvayaṃ bhūmāvavatīrya kalau kvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:8249: divyasthalāni bhūbhāge kalau tu viralāni vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:8252: nocchāstraṃ tu pratiṣṭhādi kurvantidivi devatāḥ // BhS_34.28 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8254: ārādhya ca jagannāthaṃ prāpnuvanti phalaṃ bahu // BhS_34.29 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8255: yā tu bhūmitale pūjā tādṛśī divijā na vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:8256: karmabhūmistu saṃproktā bhūmirdyairna hi tatsamā // BhS_34.30 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8257: saṃcintya puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā bhūmau lokāntarenarāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8260: arcāvatārarūpeṇa svayaṃ tīrṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // BhS_34.32 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8262: ato viprāssadā yajñairdānaiśca tapasā muhuḥ // BhS_34.33 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8266: idameva hareḥ pūjābalaṃ saṃpāditaṃ phalam // BhS_34.35 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8267: sarve 'pi sāttvikā yānti tuṣyanti svārjitaiḥ phalaiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8268: na dviṣyanti ripūnvāpi tatro dāharaṇaṃ surāḥ // BhS_34.36 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8272: vaikhānasena pūjāsītsāhi śrautī ca sammatā // BhS_34.38 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8281: na hi siddhāstapassiddhiṃ kurvanti vibhalāṃ kvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:8285: te siddhāste mahātmānaste santa nte tapasvinaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8286: ye svakarmaphalaṃ devaṃ viditvā śrīpatiṃ harim // BhS_34.45 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8289: saiddhasthale tu yā pūjā sarvaśāntikarī smṛtā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8293: saiddhasthalāni bhūyāṃsi bhaviṣyanti ca santi ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:8299: siddhā jānanti śāstrārthān siddhā jānanti cāgamān /
GR14bhrgus_u:8302: rājā taṃ tu vicāryaiva punarvaikhānasaiḥkramāt // BhS_34.53 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8305: atha paurāṇiko deśaḥ kathyate yatra yatra vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:8310: bhavantyatha kalau prāpte lupyante tānyanekaśaḥ // BhS_34.57 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8312: punāti deśaḥ paurāṇastatra kiṃ cinna hīyate // BhS_34.58 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8319: na hi paurāṇike deśe yajamānasya gauravam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8320: arthasya gauravaṃ cāpi darśanīyaṃ mahātmabhiḥ? // BhS_34.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8325: mānuṣaṃ pañcamaṃ proktaṃ sthalaṃ yatra viśeṣataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8326: grāme vā nagare vāpi śāstrokte sumanorame // BhS_34.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8332: manuṣyāḥ puṇyakarmāṇastatra tatra dine dine // BhS_34.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8344: yatra vā dṛśyate bhedo bhagavacchāstraśilpayoḥ // BhS_34.74 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8356: gṛhaṃ ca cititulyaṃ syādyatra nārādhyate hariḥ // BhS_34.80 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8358: bhuṅkte sa yāti narakān sūkareṣvasi jāyate // BhS_34.81 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8360: tasyānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyamabhakṣyeṇa samaṃ hi tat // BhS_34.82 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8366: yathā ca parame vyomni sannidhatte tathā hariḥ // BhS_34.85 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8368: sādhyā vidyādharā yakṣāssarvā vai devayonayaḥ // BhS_34.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8370: vāyurvāti sukhaṃ tatra sūryastapati tejasā // BhS_34.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8372: bhūmissasyavatī ca syātprasannaṃ ca nabho bhavet // BhS_34.88 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8375: na vyādhijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cinnāpi jvarakṛtaṃ tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8376: na vyālajaṃ bhayaṃ vāpi bhavedatrana saṃśayaḥ // BhS_34.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8377: nopaplavo nṛpāṇāṃ vā mṛgāṇāṃ vāpyapāṃ bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8380: āgnihotrāśca hūyante tapyante 'tra tapāṃsi ca // BhS_34.92 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8383: prākṛtaṃ yo vadenmūḍhassa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8391: svarṇasteye ca yatpāpaṃ surāpāne ca yadbhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8396: tasmin deśe viśeṣeṇa sarvebhāgavatā harau // BhS_34.100 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8398: na hi sarvo 'pi sarvatra svayaṃvyaktasthalādikam // BhS_34.101 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8404: tasmādaprākṛtaṃ deśaṃ na brūyātprākṛtaṃ naraḥ // BhS_34.104 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8405: na ca sāmānyabhāvena taṃ paśyedyadi paśyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8406: naśyatyeva na saṃdeha iti śāstraviniścayaḥ // BhS_34.105 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8407: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sahitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:8409: phalaśrutiḥ atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa kriyāyogaśritaṃ phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8414: kulānāṃ śatamāgāmi samatītaṃ tathā śatam // BhS_35.3 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8416: saptajanmakṛtaṃ pāpamalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu // BhS_35.4 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8420: praśastadeśe bhūbhāge yo naro bhavanaṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.6 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8424: pratimāṃ lakṣaṇavatīṃ yaḥ kārayati mānavaḥ // BhS_35.8 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8426: ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi sa mogate // BhS_35.9 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8428: tataḥ prayāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ nissamābhyadhikaṃ mahaḥ // BhS_35.10 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8430: puruṣaḥ kṛtakṛtyatvānnainaṃ śvo maraṇaṃ tapet // BhS_35.11 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8431: ye bhaviṣyanti ye 'tītā ākalpāḥ puruṣāḥ kule /
GR14bhrgus_u:8432: tāṃstārayati saṃsthāpya devasya pratiyāṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.12 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8438: nājñābhaṅgaṃ kariṣyanti bhavatāṃ jantavaḥ kvacit // BhS_35.15 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8442: pūjayanti sadā viṣṇuṃ te vastyājyāḥ sudūrataḥ // BhS_35.17 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8443: yastiṣṭhan yassvapan bhuñjan uttiṣṭhan skhaliteṣu ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:8446: nāvalokyā bhavadbhiste tattejo hanti vau gatim // BhS_35.19 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8448: arcayanti na te grāhyānarāḥ kṛṣṇāśrayoddhatāḥ // BhS_35.20 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8460: yaṃ yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ taṃ tamāpnotyasaṃśayam // BhS_35.26 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8463: karoti kṣudhitānāṃ ca bhojyāṃ pākakriyāṃ śikhī /
GR14bhrgus_u:8470: ahanyahani yatpāpaṃ kurute viṣayī naraḥ // BhS_35.31 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8472: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ tasya kāyo niṣkalmaṣo bhavet // BhS_35.32 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8476: udakābhyukṣaṇaṃ viṣṇoryaḥ karoti satā gṛhe // BhS_35.34 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8488: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānugāḥ // BhS_35.40 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8492: tasminvimāne sa narastsrī vā tiṣṭhati śobhane // BhS_35.42 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8495: liptā ca yāvatā hastā viṣṇorāyatane mahī /
GR14bhrgus_u:8499: tat kṣayādiha cāgatya viśiṣṭe jāyate kule /
GR14bhrgus_u:8508: na tasyajāyate bhaṅgo gārhasthye tu kadā ca na // BhS_35.50 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8510: nāpnoti sāpi vaidhavyaṃ gṛhabhaṅgaṃ kadā ca na // BhS_35.51 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8516: so 'pi lokaṃ samāsādya modatevai śatakratoḥ // BhS_35.54 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8518: upalipte naro datvā na durgatimavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.55 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8528: tān lokān puruṣā yāntikṣīrasnānakarā hareḥ // BhS_35.60 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8533: yathā ca vimalaṃ kṣīraṃ yathā nirvṛtikārakam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8538: yassnāpayati devasya ghṛtena pratimāṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8539: indraprasthe dvijāgṣāṇāṃ sa dadāti gavāṃ śatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8540: gavāṃ śatasya viprāṇāṃ na dattasya bhavetphalam // BhS_35.66 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8542: purā rājarṣibhiḥ prāptā saptadvīpā vasundharā // BhS_35.67 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8544: pratimāsaṃ sitāṣṭamyāṃ ghṛtena jagataḥ patim // BhS_35.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8546: dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca gavyena haviṣā hareḥ // BhS_35.69 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8548: jñānato 'jñānato vāpi yatpāpaṃ kurute naraḥ // BhS_35.70 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8551: sa gatvāvaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma modate saha sūribhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8552: srajaṃ baddhvā sumanasāṃ yaḥ prayacchati viṣṇave // BhS_35.72 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8560: upānahau pāduke ca vāhanaṃ yānameva ca // BhS_35.76 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8562: sa vimānaṃ tu dutprāpaṃ prāpno tyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.77 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8565: sāmīpyaṃ sahasā viṣṇoryāti sadyo sa saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8566: dhvajaṃ ca vādyamutpādya viṣṇusātkurute tu yaḥ // BhS_35.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8568: dāsīdāsaṃ tathātmāna mātmīyaṃ ca prayacchali // BhS_35.80 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8574: dīpaṃ prayacchati naro viṣṇorāyatane hi yaḥ // BhS_35.83 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8580: jātismaratvaṃ prajñāṃ ca prākāśyaṃ sarvavantuṣu // BhS_35.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8582: sarvakālaṃ ca cakṣuṣmān medhāvī dīpado naraḥ // BhS_35.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8583: jāyate narakaṃ cāpi tamassaṃjñaṃ na paśyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8588: kurvīta dīpahartāca mūkū'ndho jāyate jaḍaḥ // BhS_35.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8594: idānīṃ yātanā bhaugāḥkiṃ vilāpaḥ kariṣyati // BhS_35.93 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8596: etatkona vijānāti yena yūyaṃ pramādinaḥ // BhS_35.94 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8604: na vo vilapite kiṃ cididānīṃ dṛśyate phalam // BhS_35.98 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8611: yadbhūyo 'pi matiḥ pāpe na kartavyā kathaṃ ca na /
GR14bhrgus_u:8616: haviṣāṃ pāyasādīnāṃ haraye ca nivedanāt // BhS_35.104 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8631: taṭākānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi kṛtānāṃ cāpi ye guṇāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8632: triṣu lokeṣu sarvatra pūjanīyaḥ pratāpavān // BhS_35.112 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8638: taṭākāni ca sarvāṇi diśanti śriyamuttamām // BhS_35.115 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8640: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃśrayanti jalāśayam // BhS_35.116 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8643: varṣākāle taṭāke tu salilaṃ yasya tiṣṭhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8645: śaratkā le tu salilaṃ taṭāke yasya tiṣṭhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8648: sa vai bahusuvarṇasya yajñasya labhate phalam // BhS_35.120 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8649: yasya vai śaiśire kāle taṭāke salilaṃ bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8652: atirātrasya yajñasya phalaṃ sa samupāśnute // BhS_35.122 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8654: vājimedhapalaṃ tasya phalaṃ vai munayo viduḥ // BhS_35.123 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8655: sa kulaṃ tārayetsarvaṃ yasya khāte jalāśaye /
GR14bhrgus_u:8656: gāvaḥ pibanti salilaṃ sādhavaśca narāssadā // BhS_35.124 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8657: taṭāke yasya gāvastu pibanti tṛṣitā jalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8661: durlabhaṃ salilaṃ ceha viśeṣeṇa paratra vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:8664: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānu gāḥ // BhS_35.128 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8666: snātvā kurvanti karmāṇi tasya nākesthitirbhavet // BhS_35.129 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8668: tasya lokā bhavantyeva pāvanāḥ kṣativarjitāḥ // BhS_35.130 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8672: sthānarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jātayaṣṣaṭ prakīrtitāḥ // BhS_35.132 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8674: etā jātyastu vṛkṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rope guṇāstvime // BhS_35.133 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8675: kīrtiśca mānave loke pretya caiva phalaṃ śubham /
GR14bhrgus_u:8676: labhate nāma loke ca pitṛbhiśca mahīyate // BhS_35.134 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8680: tasya putrā bhavantyete pādapā nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8682: puṣpaissuragaṇān vṛkṣāḥ phalaiścāpi tathā pitṛn // BhS_35.137 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8688: patraṃ phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yasyārāme 'varopite // BhS_35.140 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8690: patraiḥphalair vāpuṣpairvā prīyate bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.141 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8694: ete svarge mahīyante ye cānye satyavādinaḥ // BhS_35.143 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8696: yajecca vividhairyajñaissatyaṃ ca satataṃ vadet // BhS_35.144 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8700: acalā hyakṣayo bhūmissarvān kāmān prayacchati // BhS_35.146 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8702: tasyaihikaṃ bhavetpuṇyaṃ tathā pāratrikaṃ bahu // BhS_35.147 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8707: brahmārpaṇadhiyā yastu guptaṃ dāsyati kiṃ cana /
GR14bhrgus_u:8710: yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ tu manasi kṛtvā yadyacca yor'payet // BhS_35.151 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8716: sarvameva bhaveddattaṃ vasudhāṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.154 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8724: sa śatānyeva gokarṇamiti vedavido vidaḥ // BhS_35.158 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8728: evaṃ bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye prarohati // BhS_35.160 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8732: evaṃ dattāciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmirbharati bhūmidam // BhS_35.162 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8734: yo dadāti naraśreṣṭhassa na pracyavate divaḥ // BhS_35.163 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8740: gandharvāpsaraso yatra tatra tiṣṭhanti bhūmidāḥ // BhS_35.166 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8743: yasya yasya yadā bhūmi stasya tasya tadā phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8744: bhūmiṃ yaḥ pratigṛhṇāti yaśca bhūmiṃ prayacchati // BhS_35.168 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8750: punaśca janma saṃpāpya bhavedbhūmi patirdhruvam // BhS_35.171 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8751: yathā bhūmissadā devī dātāraṃ kurute patim /
GR14bhrgus_u:8754: mahīṃ dadatpavitrassyātpuṇyā ca jagatī yataḥ // BhS_35.173 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8761: yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa puṣṇāti svasutaṃ mudā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8764: na tatphalamavāpnoti yaddatvā vasudhāṃ punaḥ // BhS_35.178 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8766: ghorāśca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidam // BhS_35.179 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8769: ādityā iva dīpyante tejasā di mānavāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8770: ye prayacchanti vasudhāṃ haraye lokasākṣiṇe // BhS_35.181 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8775: sa naḥ kulasya puruṣassano bandhussano guruḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8776: sa dātā sa ca vikrānto yo dadāti vasuṃdharām // BhS_35.184 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8780: dhenuṃ datvā suvratāṃ ca sopadhānāṃ payasvinīm // BhS_35.186 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8782: devadevasya tuṣṭyarthaṃ devāya brāhmaṇāya vā // BhS_35.187 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8783: na tasya śakyate vaktuṃ phalaṃ varṣaśatairapi /
GR14bhrgus_u:8785: tāvadvarṣa sahasrāṇi kāmān duhyeta sā varā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8788: sā gauḥ kāmadughā bhūtvā dātāramupasarpati // BhS_35.190 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8790: parāṃ vṛddhiṃśriyaṃ prāpya svargaloke mahīyate // BhS_35.191 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8792: gacchetsukṛtināṃ lokān gāvo datvā yathāvidhi // BhS_35.192 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8794: tasyāpi cākṣayā lokā bhavantīha paratra ca // BhS_35.193 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8795: yo vā dyūte dhanaṃ jitvāgāvaḥkrītvā prayacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8798: sa gatvā durlabhaṃ sthānamamaraissaha modate // BhS_35.195 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8800: sa gatvā virajān lokān sukhaṃ vasati devavat // BhS_35.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8804: tamaḥ praviśate datvā dvijaṃ kleśena yojayet // BhS_35.198 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8806: yuñjyātlkeśaistu yo vipraṃ datvaināṃ tadvṛdhā bhavet // BhS_35.199 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8807: yuvānaṃ balinaṃ śyāmaṃ halena saha yūthapam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8809: brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ caiva kulamekaṃ dvidhā kṛtam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8810: ekatra mantrā stiṣṭhanti havirekatra tiṣṭhati // BhS_35.201 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8818: tulyaprabhāvā devaiste modante psarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // BhS_35.205 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8822: yathaiva salile matsyassalilena sahoṣya te // BhS_35.207 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8826: tānu dattāsu loke 'smin kiṃ na dattaṃ bhavediha // BhS_35.209 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8829: suvarṇaṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇā parā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8832: apipāpaśataṃ kṛtvā dattaṃ vipriṣu tārayet // BhS_35.212 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8837: agnyabhāve ca kurvanti vahnisthāne ca kāñcanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8849: na hyataḥ paramaṃ loke sadyaḥ pāpavināśanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8850: brahmakośasya śuddhasya suvarṇaṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.221 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8852: iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ svarṇadānaphalaṃ mayā // BhS_35.222 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8854: viṣṇave ca śriyai bhūmyai sarvadevebhya eva ca // BhS_35.223 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8856: na śakyate phalaṃ tasya vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi // BhS_35.224 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8862: lokatantraṃ hi saṃjñāśca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.227 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8863: annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8866: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ viśvaṃ jagadidaṃ mahat // BhS_35.229 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8868: annādbhavanti vai prāṇāḥ pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.230 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8876: annadaḥ prāpnute bhū yo bhuvi ceha ca yatsukham // BhS_35.234 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8878: api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṃ vipraṇaśyati // BhS_35.235 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8884: brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena muhyate // BhS_35.238 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8886: annadāmapi śūdre ca brāhmaṇasya viśiṣyate // BhS_35.239 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8892: asmākamapi putro vā pautro vānnaṃ pradāsyati // BhS_35.242 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8894: akāmovā sakāmo vā datvā puṇyamavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.243 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8896: viprā yamadhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇā gṛhaṃ sadā // BhS_35.244 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8898: mahābhoge kule pretya janma cāpnoti nityaśaḥ // BhS_35.245 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8900: nityaṃ mṛṣṭānnadāyī tu svarge vasati satkṛtaḥ // BhS_35.246 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8902: annadaḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavānapi // BhS_35.247 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8904: annadaḥprāṇado loke sarvadaḥ procyate tu saḥ // BhS_35.248 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8908: upyate yatra tadbījaṃ taddhi puṇyaphalaṃ mahat // BhS_35.250 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8914: annaṃ bhuvaṃ divaṃ khaṃ ca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.253 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8915: anna praṇāśe bhidyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8918: nivartante viśeṣeṇa brahma cātra pradīyate // BhS_35.255 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8920: triṣulokeṣu dharmārthamannaṃ deyaṃ tato budhaiḥ // BhS_35.256 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8922: āyuśca vardhate tadvatteṣu lokeṣu niścitam // BhS_35.257 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8924: yacca meghagataṃ vāri śakro varṣati harṣitaḥ // BhS_35.258 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8927: tadyathā meghato vāri patitaṃ bhavati kṣitau /
GR14bhrgus_u:8928: tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhāvitā // BhS_35.260 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8932: agniṣṭomau hi tacchrakraṃ sṛjataḥ puṣyataśca ha // BhS_35.262 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8934: eka eva smṛto rāśistato bhūtāni jaṅgire // BhS_35.263 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8938: bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣāṃ mahātmanām // BhS_35.265 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8945: vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpādīrghi kāścaiva sarvaśaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8948: kṣīraṃ sravanti saritastathā caivānna parvatāḥ // BhS_35.270 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8952: haviḥpātrādi sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmrameva vā // BhS_35.272 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8958: dadyāttāmrāṇi kāṃsyāni sārokyaṃ padameti saḥ // BhS_35.275 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8961: śvetaṃ vitānaṃ raktaṃ vā kṛṣṇaṃ pītaṃ ca śyāmalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8962: dukūlenātha paṭṭena tantunānyena vā kṛtam // BhS_35.277 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8964: sopadhānāṃ satalpāṃ ca khaṭvāṃ dadyācca yohareḥ // BhS_35.278 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8968: rājyakāmī tu rājā syātsārvabhaumo 'pi jāyate // BhS_35.280 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8970: cāmaraṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ ca vyajanaṃ ratnabhūṣitam // BhS_35.281 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8971: kevalaṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ vā bhaktyā śaktyā ca saṃyutam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8976: aśakyaṃ tatphalaṃ vaktuṃ sarvairapi surāsuraiḥ // BhS_35.284 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8977: sauvarmaṃ viṣṇurūpantu yo bhaktyaiva tu kārayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8982: haimaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yo bhaktyaivār'payeddhareḥ // BhS_35.287 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8985: haimaṃ yānaṃ tathāruhya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8987: siṃhāsanaṃ vā yo dadyātsomalokaṃ sa gacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8989: hṛdyavāksusvaro hṛdyo vāgmī sa tu bhavennaraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8995: yadyaddravyaṃ mudā yukto dadyāttu haraye naraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8996: tadagre pūjakebhyaśca gurave ca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.294 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9000: yadyatkarma tadarthaṃ syātparicaryā ca tasya yā // BhS_35.296 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9001: tasyopacāraṃ yatkarma karoti śraddhayā tu yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9002: sarvayajñaphalaṃ prāpya nāmīpyaṃ padamāpnu yāt // BhS_35.297 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9006: athār'cane phalaṃ vakṣye viśeṣeṇa madhudviṣaḥ // BhS_35.299 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9008: sāyaṃ prātaśca deveśaṃ namasyannatha cintayan // BhS_35.300 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9009: yaḥ pramāmaṃ muhuḥ kuryātsa tu yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9014: yaḥ kuryātpūjanaṃ viṣṇostatra devo vaseddhruvam // BhS_35.303 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9016: ābhirūpyācca biṃbasya sannidheḥ procyate hareḥ // BhS_35.304 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9017: āsanaṃ haraye datvā pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate ciram /
GR14bhrgus_u:9020: pādyamācamanīyaṃ ca samarpya haraye naraḥ // BhS_35.306 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9022: nityaṃ puṣpāṇi puṇyāni bhaktyā yastu samarcayet // BhS_35.307 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9026: tasyānantaphalaṃ prokta mananto bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.309 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9030: maṅgalaṃ tasya niśchidraṃ bhavedeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.311 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9032: sa cāna ntaphalaṃ prāpya modate viṣṇusannedhau // BhS_35.312 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9035: bahujātisumānāṃ ca dānena prīyate sa vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:9038: tulasīṃ mūrthni devasya samarpya madhuvidviṣaḥ // BhS_35.315 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9040: sarvāṅgeṣvarpayan puṣpaṃ sarvagasya naro hareḥ // BhS_35.316 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9048: sarveṣāmapi puṣpāṇāṃ tulasī prītidā hareḥ // BhS_35.320 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9050: anugacchati taṃ devo yathā gorvatsalā bhṛśam // BhS_35.321 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9056: ye kurvanti hareḥ pūjāṃ te kṛtārthāḥ kalau yuge // BhS_35.324 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9057: śuṣkaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vār'draṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vā tulasīdalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9060: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ puṣpaṃ na varjyaṃ tulasīdalam // BhS_35.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9061: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ toyaṃ na varjyaṃ jāhnavījalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9062: anyatparyuṣitaṃ varjyaṃ na varjyaṃ padmapuṣpakam // BhS_35.327 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9066: devā divisthitā ye vaitiṣṭhanti tulasīdale // BhS_35.329 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9068: yāvanna prāpyate puṇyā tulasī viṣṇuvallabhā // BhS_35.330 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9072: nārcayeddūrvayā durgāṃ na tulasyā surāntaram // BhS_35.332 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9076: harerabhyarcanāyāṃ ca tulasī sādhanaṃ param // BhS_35.334 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9080: tathā tuṣyati govindo yathaina tulasīdalaiḥ // BhS_35.336 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9082: tulasyaiva hareḥ pūjāṃ ye kurvanti sadā bhuvi // BhS_35.337 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9083: tasmāttulasyā sadṛśaṃ sa ca bhūtaṃ na bhāvi ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:9090: tulasīkānanaṃ yatra yatra vā harikīrtanam // BhS_35.341 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9095: sūryalokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9096: ghṛtena kāpilenaiva dṛḍhavartiyutaṃ tu yaḥ // BhS_35.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9098: so 'ndhaṃ naiva praviśati narakaṃ narapuṅgavaḥ // BhS_35.345 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9102: tasya pāpāni naśyanti nirlepassa bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9104: candralokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.348 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9105: sugandhi śubhamutpūtaṃ snānatoyaṃ ca yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9107: tataśca vāruṇaṃ lokaṃ prāpya tatraiva modate /
GR14bhrgus_u:9110: kārpāsamatha ca kṣaumaṃ kauśeyaṃ rāṅkavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9116: jāṃbūnadaṃ śātakuṃbhaṃ hāṭakaṃ vaiṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.354 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9117: śruṅgī ca śuktijaṃ caiva jātarūpamataḥ param /
GR14bhrgus_u:9122: rājaśriyaṃ ca bhuktvā nte viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.357 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9132: tasya prasannau jāyete daṃpatī jagataḥ patī // BhS_35.362 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9133: mātrāṃ ca devadesya datvā haste viśeṣataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9142: kṛsaraṃ vinivedyaiva devasya mudito naraḥ // BhS_35.367 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9144: gaulyaṃ nivedya devasya prāpnoti guḍaparvatān // BhS_35.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9146: yavodanasya donena nīrogo bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.369 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9150: sugandhi svādu śuddhaṃ ca pānīyaṃ yo harerdadet // BhS_35.371 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9152: kadalyā nārikelasya cūtasya panasasya ca // BhS_35.372 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9153: phalāni ca nupakvāni bhaktyā śuddhāni yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9157: tāṃbūlaṃ kramukairyuktaṃ mukhavāsaṃ ca yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9160: balaṃ balavatāṃ labdhvā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.376 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9161: baliṃ seveta yo bhaktyā so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9164: viṣṇoḥ kathāstu saṃkīrtyastotraiḥ stutvā ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ // BhS_35.378 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9170: sakāmānāṃ phalaṃ kāmyamakāmānāṃ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.381 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9172: utsāha utsavaḥ prokto manuṣyāṇāṃ viśeṣetaḥ // BhS_35.382 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9176: utsavaṃ devadevasya yaḥ kuryātsvakulaṃ svakam // BhS_35.384 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9177: uttārayan svayaṃ viṣṇossa yāti paramaṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9179: sa yajño vo narān yuṣmānuttārayati niścayam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9180: iti vedā vadantīti sa utsava udīrya te // BhS_35.386 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9182: yaścotsavena yajate tayostulyaṃ phalaṃ nmṛtam // BhS_35.387 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9184: devasyāśnuvate sarvaṃ ye yajante saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.388 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9187: karmāṇā manasā vācā te 'pi yānti phalaṃ bahu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9188: grāme vā ragare va'pi pattane vā mahotsavaḥ // BhS_35.390 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9190: yatra deśe janapade rāṣṭre vā pyutsavo hareḥ // BhS_35.391 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9202: ālepanaṃ mārjanaṃ ca rajaḥ praśamanaṃ tathā // BhS_35.397 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9205: yānaṃ vahanti ye viprāste yānti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9206: rathaṃ vahanti ye cāśvāste 'pi yāntisurālayam // BhS_35.399 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9210: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni ye tatrādhīyate janāḥ // BhS_35.401 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9211: te pare vyomni devasya pārśve vartanti nisspṛhāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9219: taddravyaṃ varthate tasya naśyaṃ tyevāśubhāni tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9220: rājño rāṣṭrasya taddravyaṃ samṛddhyaiva bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.406 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9222: nirmāti yaḥprapāṃ viṣṇordevasya nnapanāya vai // BhS_35.407 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9252: yastu kuryājjaladroṇīṃ snānapīṭhaṃ ca śārṅgiṇaḥ // BhS_35.422 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9253: sa sarvaiḥ pūjyayānantu pīṭhe cātyunna te vaset /
GR14bhrgus_u:9254: evaṃ yassnapanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kārayecchaktito naraḥ // BhS_35.423 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9256: ante vimāsamāruhya haimaṃ devaiḥ parīvṛtaḥ // BhS_35.424 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9260: devadevasya viṣṇostu snapanaṃ bhaktimāṃstu yaḥ // BhS_35.426 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9261: seveta so 'pi pāpmabhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9264: utsavaṃ sevateyastu so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet // BhS_35.428 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9268: anyeṣvapi ca puṇyeṣu kāryeṣu jagataḥ prabhum // BhS_35.430 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9271: khaṇḍite sphaṭite dhāmni dūṣite ca sūdhādibhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9272: samādadhyātpunardhāma sa lokaṃ yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ // BhS_35.432 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9274: sthāpayedbhakti yuktaśca sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // BhS_35.433 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9276: yaḥ sandhāya punaḥ kuryātpritiṣṭhāṃ pūrvavanmudā // BhS_35.434 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9278: śīrṇe jīrṇe tathā bhinne bhūṣaṇādau viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.435 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9282: tasya kāyakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva naśyati // BhS_35.437 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9286: yo dadyāducitāṃ vṛttiṃ sa yamaṃ nopasarpati // BhS_35.439 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9292: tasya vāso bhavetsvarge cāvadidrāśca turdhaśa // BhS_35.442 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9294: tasya tuṣyati deveśassa tu svārājyamaśnu te // BhS_35.443 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9296: dṛṣṭvā ca śraddhayā yuktoyo devamupatiṣṭhate // BhS_35.444 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9302: prāyaścittavidhānaṃ tu provāca jagatāṃ hitaḥ // BhS_35.447 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9309: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyaṃ tridaśairapi /
GR14bhrgus_u:9310: iha loke 'khilān kāmānanubhūya sukhaṃ cirāt // BhS_35.451 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9320: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa kriyālope ca yatphalam // BhS_35.456 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9327: svayaṃ nivartate yastu tasya syānmahatī vipat /
GR14bhrgus_u:9328: saṃkalpya devatāgāraṃ nirmātuṃ yo viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.460 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9330: ācāryassatataṃ goptā ācāryastu pitā smṛtaḥ // BhS_35.461 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9332: ārabhya gehanirmāṇaṃ devasya jagataḥ pateḥ // BhS_35.462 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9333: asamāpya tu yo mūḍho nivarte pravilobhataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9334: tasya saṃpadvināśassyāt kruddho bhavati cāvyayaḥ // BhS_35.463 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9336: yaḥ kuryādantarāyaṃ tu tasya puṇyaṃ vinaśyati // BhS_35.464 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9337: yena vighnastadā bhūyāttaṃ hatvāpi na doṣabhāk /
GR14bhrgus_u:9338: yastu śāstroditaṃ karma kurvantaṃ ca padārthinam // BhS_35.465 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9342: adhvare vartamāne tu saṃbhārān śāstracoditān // BhS_35.467 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9343: yo na dadyātsa pāpīyān nāpnuyāt karmajaṃ phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9344: pratiṣṭhāpya harerbiṃbaṃ yo na satkurute gurum // BhS_35.468 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9346: pratiṣṭhānte tathā nityamavicchinnaṃ tu pūjitum // BhS_35.469 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9350: sa bhavedbrahmahā caiva dhanaṃ tasya vilupyati // BhS_35.471 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9354: anyaṃ vā yojayettatra tāvubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ // BhS_35.473 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9358: sarve ca kramaśaḥ pūjāṃ kartumarhanti te yataḥ // BhS_35.475 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9359: pitryaṃ bhavati devasya dāyādyaṃ pūjanaṃ svataḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:9394: brahmasve no matiṃ kuryātprāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // BhS_35.493 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9412: brāhmaṇānāṃ hṛte kṣetre hanyādāsaptamaṃ kulam // BhS_35.502 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9428: gale nigalitaḥ pāśaiḥ kṛṣyate nirayeṣu saḥ // BhS_35.510 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9436: uṣitvā narakeṣvete jāyante phaṇināṃ kule // BhS_35.514 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9446: kṛtinaḥ pretya narake pacyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ // BhS_35.519 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9460: agnidāhabhayaṃ caiva mandāgnitvaṃ ca jāyate // BhS_35.526 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9472: anyārāmodbhavaṃ puṣpaṃ nār'payediti ke cana // BhS_35.532 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9480: bhugnapatraṃ na ca grāhyaṃ kṛmiduṣṭaṃ ca nāharet // BhS_35.536 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9482: sthalajaṃ noddharetpuṣpaṃ chedayejjalajaṃ na tu // BhS_35.537 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9487: snānaṃ kṛtvā tu ye ke citpuṣpaṃ gṛhṇanti vaidvijāḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:9497: janmadvayaṃ tu vai mūḍhaśśūdratāṃ yāti mānavaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9503: arghyahīne tu devasya kulaṃ bhavati ninditam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9508: havirnivedane hīne durbhikṣaṃ bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.550 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9510: nālikeraphale hīne hīne kṣīrādike tathā // BhS_35.551 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9512: hīne bhakṣyādike caiva vividhe haviṣī prabho // BhS_35.552 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9518: śāntasya pūjane hīne tathā caivānapāyinām // BhS_35.555 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9525: bhūtapīṭhasya pārśve vā dakṣiṇe vā viśeṣataḥ, /
GR14bhrgus_u:9528: śrīdevyā arcane hīne saṃpadāṃ tu bhavet kṣayaḥ // BhS_35.560 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9530: agnipūjāvihīne tu nyūne vā mantravarjite // BhS_35.561 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9536: balakṣayo janānāṃ syātpitṝṇāṃ patanaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.564 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9542: biṃbanyāsavihīne tu kalatraṃ tasya naśyati // BhS_35.567 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9545: dakṣiṇādānahīne tu sā pūjā niṣphalā bhavet /

GR14bhrgus_u:9558: viṣude cāyane caiva hīne tatroktakarmaṇi // BhS_35.575 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9561: akāle ca kṛte vāpi bhavet kṣāmabhayaṃ tathā /

GR14bhrgus_u:9565: tasya pāpaphalaṃ naktuṃ na kenāpi hi śakyate /

GR14bhrgus_u:9568: mṛtsuhīnānu nāśassyātsasyānāṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.580 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9570: dhānyeṣu tu vihīneṣu dyānyanāśo bhavettathā // BhS_35.581 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9576: kṣīrahīne bhavettasya malinā kīrtireva hi // BhS_35.584 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9588: vanauṣadhīnāṃ cālābhe rogī bhavati niścayaḥ // BhS_35.590 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9590: mūlagandhavihīne tu vārdhakyaṃ bhavati dhravam // BhS_35.591 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9599: tatkriyā lopitā vāpi sa bhaveddevahā dhruvam /

GR14bhrgus_u:9614: nnityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ kuryāttadakṛtaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.603 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9616: iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ kriyāyogāśritaṃ phalam // BhS_35.604 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9626: uccairbhāṣā vṛdhājalpo rodanādyaṃ ca vigrahaḥ // BhS_36.4 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9639: sa yāti narakān ghorān santataṃ bhṛśadāruṇān /

GR14bhrgus_u:9656: eteṣāṃ dāruṇānāṃ tu narakāṇāṃ patisthsitaḥ // BhS_36.19 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9668: anye caturyugaṃ martyāstadardhaṃ ca narādhamāḥ // BhS_36.25 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9672: na śruṇvanti ca ye mūḍhāssādhūktaṃ dharmagauravam // BhS_36.27 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9680: labhante te punardebaṃ yātanīyaṃ svakarmajam // BhS_36.31 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9690: ṣaṣṭhī taralatārākhyā saptamī ca bhayāvahā // BhS_36.36 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9696: trikoṇā pañcakoṇā ca sudīrghā parivartulā // BhS_36.39 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9698: ityetā nāmataḥ proktā ghorā narakakoṭayaḥ // BhS_36.40 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9700: tāsāṃ krameṇa vijñeyāḥ pañca pañcaikanāyakāḥ // BhS_36.41 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9702: rauravaḥ prathamasteṣāṃ rudante yatra dehinaḥ // BhS_36.42 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9704: tamaśśītaṃ yathā coṣṇaṃ pañcādyā nāyakāssmṛtāḥ // BhS_36.43 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9740: rauravādyaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca śatamekantu sarvataḥ // BhS_36.61 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9754: samantataḥ pralipyante tāmreṇa ca punaḥ punaḥ // BhS_36.68 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9774: kramādāpūryate karṇau? narakeṣu ca yātanāḥ // BhS_36.78 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9776: ye tu deva gṛhaṃ gatvā tatra sevārthamāgatāḥ // BhS_36.79 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9794: kiṃ pradhāvasi vegena na te moho 'sti saṃprati // BhS_36.88 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9795: laṅghitaste yathā bhartā pāpaṃ bhuṅkṣva tadādhunā /
GR14bhrgus_u:9798: ulūkhalādyaiḥ kṣodyante prapīḍyante śilāsu ca // BhS_36.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9802: mahajvāle ca narake pāpāḥ pacyanti sarvataḥ // BhS_36.92 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9852: pradattāṃ devadevasya tannāmnā pūjakasya vā // BhS_36.117 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9864: teṣāṃ śiśnaṃ savṛṣaṇaṃ hanyate lohamudgaraiḥ, // BhS_36.123 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9866: aropyante gude teṣāṃ yāvanmūrdhni vinirgataiḥ // BhS_36.124 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9867: tataḥ kṣāreṇa mahatā tāmreṇa trapuṇā punaḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:9872: dhane satyapi ye dānaṃ na ca yacchanti tṛṣṇayā // BhS_36.127 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9880: jihvā tataḥ prabhinnā ca gāḍhaṃ śṛṅkhalayā punaḥ // BhS_36.131 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9886: bhidyante varṣa dhārābhiśśuṣyante vāyunā punaḥ // BhS_36.134 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9890: tasmātpāpaṃ na kurvīta cañcale jīvite sati // BhS_36.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9892: tataḥ kṣitiṃ samāsādya jāyante dehinaḥ punaḥ // BhS_36.137 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9910: aśakto 'pyatha vāśakta āḍhyo vā durvidho 'dha vā // BhS_36.146 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9912: na hi saṃharate jyotsnāṃ candraścaṇḍālaveśmani // BhS_36.147 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9916: devateha parañjyotireka eva paraḥ pumān // BhS_36.149 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9917: sa eva bahudhā loke māyayā bhidyate svayā /
GR14bhrgus_u:9918: viṣṇvākhyassa svayaṃ māyaṃ prakṛtiṃ vyajya sa dvidhā // BhS_36.150 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9922: catasra eva vijñeyā vedavarṇa yugāśrayāḥ // BhS_36.152 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9936: sa trayodaśadhā caiva viśvedevādibhiḥ sthitaḥ // BhS_36.159 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9940: mūrtyantaraiśca vijñeyo bahudhā tasya vistaraḥ // BhS_36.161 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9950: nīlaḥ pītastathā rakto nānāvarṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhS_36.166 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9953: āsyaṃ vedāśca ye 'nantā toyaṃ rudhirameva ca /

GR14bhrgus_u:9956: rudrā ekādaśa jñe yā stasya kaṇṭhaṃ samāśritā // BhS_36.169 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9963: nadyaśca vasudhā cāsya nāgāśca nalake sthitāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9966: nakhāgreṣu ca vijñeyā divyā oṣadhayas tathā // BhS_36.174 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9968: ṛtavo bāhumūle tu māsāḥ karataleṣu ca // BhS_36.175 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9977: nāmnāṃ śataṃ sahasraṃ vā tathānantaṃ paṭhantiyat /

GR14bhrgus_u:9983: brāhmaṇā mukhate yasya kṣatriyā yasya bāhutaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9984: ūruto yasya vai jātā vaiśyāśceti narā bhuvi // BhS_36.183 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9990: tatprasādādṛte jñātuṃ vaktuṃ vā naiva śakyate // BhS_36.186 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9992: aśeṣaṃ vāṅmayaṃ cedaṃ lokālokaṃ carācaram // BhS_36.187 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10002: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktamiva ca sthitam // BhS_36.192 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10003: bhūtabhartṛca tad jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca /

GR14bhrgus_u:10010: ātmā sa hyantarātmā ca paramātmā ca saṃsmṛtaḥ // BhS_36.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10014: vede ca bhagavacchāstre sāṃkhye yoge tathaiva ca // BhS_36.198 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10016: paṭhyate nikhilairnityaṃ viśvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jagat // BhS_36.199 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10017: yacca bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyacca vartamānaṃ tu kiṃ cana /
GR14bhrgus_u:10020: niyatiśca kalā kālaḥ sarvamanyacca tanmayam // BhS_36.201 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10022: sarvabhūtāni caivācau na tadastīha yanna saḥ // BhS_36.202 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10030: aśvikṛṣṇau ca dikṣveṣāṃ lokairaṇḍaṃ sahākhilam // BhS_36.206 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10045: govindatīti govindo gāvo vindanti yaṃ tathā /

GR14bhrgus_u:10065: śrutibhiḥ procyate brahma viṣṇvākhyaṃ jātu netarat /

GR14bhrgus_u:10072: taddevasya priyaṃ bhūyādyatassammānanaṃ tu tat // BhS_36.227 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10073: tasya sannihito devo yasya citte janārdanaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10076: nārī vā bālako vātha vṛddha ātura eva vā // BhS_36.229 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10077: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ nāsti pretya yugyaśca jāyate /

GR14bhrgus_u:10079: te yāsyanti padaṃ viṣṇoryasmātpādaca rāstu te /
GR14bhrgus_u:10080: ye vāhayanti jantūṃstān ste 'pimūḍhāḥ patanti vai // BhS_36.231 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10082: sa yāmīryātanāḥ prāpya todyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ // BhS_36.232 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10084: yo vā bhṛtakadānena vāhanena tu mānavaḥ // BhS_36.233 //
