GR14bhrgus_u:10092: praṇāmaṃ haraye kuryātta sya dūrataro hariḥ // BhS_36.237 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10096: praviśetprayato bhūtvā prākāraṃ prathamaṃ punaḥ // BhS_36.239 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10106: gṛhādgṛhaṃ tathā gadvā bhikṣārthī kṣudhitassvayam // BhS_36.244 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10108: catvāri caiva janmāni teṣāmante ca yo budhaḥ? // BhS_36.245 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10109: caṇḍālayoni māpnoti janmāni daśa pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10117: yaḥ varaḥ prakṛteḥ proktaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣo 'vyayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10118: sa eva sarvabhūtātmā nara ityabhidhīyate // BhS_36.250 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10120: tānyeva cāyanaṃ yasya sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhS_36.251 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10121: nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ brahma tattvaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10125: na jātu labhyate kiñcidyenāvyāptaṃ tu kiṃ cana /
GR14bhrgus_u:10128: anyatra taṃ samāropya yadi copāsanaṃ bhavet // BhS_36.255 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10133: vaiṣṇavā avatārāśca ye tu śāstroditāḥ purā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10134: paramārthe na bhidyante nānyatvaṃ syātparasparam // BhS_36.258 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10136: tat sthānāṃ daivatānāṃ vā nānyatvaṃ jātu saṃbhavet // BhS_36.259 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10139: hariṃ devaṃ tu saṃsevya vāhanasthaṃ dvijottamaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10140: yadanyaṃ sedate vīthyāṃ tatkāle vāhanasthitam // BhS_36.261 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10142: deveśasyotsavo yatra grāme vā nagare 'pi vā // BhS_36.262 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10146: vaiṣṇavaṃ kratudeśantu gatvā seveta mānavaḥ // BhS_36.264 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10148: śrutvā devotsavāraṃbhaṃ paṅgūbhāvena yo naraḥ // BhS_36.265 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10152: yo 'nyatra vyāpṛtastatra na gaccheddurmanā naraḥ // BhS_36.267 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10153: na tasya niṣkṛtiḥ proktā sa pāpī narakaṃ vrajet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10156: tanya pūrvārjitaṃ puṇyaṃ tat kṣaṇādeva naśyati // BhS_36.269 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10157: devotsavaṃ tu yo martyo yatamānaṃ tu sevitum /
GR14bhrgus_u:10158: vārayedyena kenāpi hetunā sa tu durmatiḥ // BhS_36.270 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10162: tat kṣaṇādyo na gacchettu tasya pāpaṃ mahadbhavet // BhS_36.272 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10164: āsīnasthsita evātra sa yāmīryātanā vrajet // BhS_36.273 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10166: sa pāpiṣṭhataro loke niṣkṛtirnāsya vidyate // BhS_36.274 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10173: hastau dvau nirmitau dhātrā kiṃ tena sukṛtaṃ bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10177: iha vai jāyate paṅgū rogī caiva na saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10180: kiṃ svādhīnena hastena svādhīnaṃ karma sevitum // BhS_36.281 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10190: yatra mānasikārcā syāttacca mānasikaṃ bhavet // BhS_36.286 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10191: antaryāmī ya evāste hṛdaye niṣkalo hariḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10192: sa eva sakalo bhūtvā biṃbe yatsannidhāpitaḥ // BhS_36.287 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10194: na kadāpi bhavetprājña ucbhiṣṭassveṣu karmasu // BhS_36.288 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10195: viṇmūtraṃ pathi kṛtvātu śaucaṃ yāvanna cācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:10198: kṣipettu devatāgāre sa bhavedbrahmahā naraḥ // BhS_36.290 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10202: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // BhS_36.292 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10204: saṃsthitastrīṇi janmāni vasatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.293 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10212: purīṣaṃ vātra kurvīta yo naro bhagavadgṛhe // BhS_36.297 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10214: tato muktastu pāpātmā viṣṭhāyāṃ jāyate kṛmiḥ // BhS_36.298 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10216: sa tiṣṭhedraurave ghore varṣāṇāmayutaṃ śatam // BhS_36.299 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10222: tathā nirlekhayejjihvāṃ sa pāpī naśyati dhruvam // BhS_36.302 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10225: sa yāti gṛhagodhātvaṃ navajanmāni pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10226: anugamya yathā pretaṃ yāti devālayaṃ tu yaḥ // BhS_36.304 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10228: balibhugyonitāṃ yāti janmāni subahūni vai // BhS_36.305 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10229: bharaṇaṃ tu tathā kṛtvā mṛtakasya viśeṣataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10230: mandiraṃ na praveṣṭavyaṃ praviṣṭastu praṇaśyati // BhS_36.306 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10232: bhaviṣyati tathā bhūyaḥ pṛthak krūro 'tha niṣṭhuraḥ // BhS_36.307 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10234: arcayedvā viśeṣeṇa caṭako jāyate khalaḥ // BhS_36.308 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10236: chāyāmākramya yo mohādyāti viṣṇostu mandiram // BhS_36.309 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10242: apasavyaṃ ca dhṛtvaiva dhṛtvā caiva nivītavat // BhS_36.312 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10243: na gaccheddevatāgāraṃ na vā muktaśikho naraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10248: durācāro hi puruṣo nehāyurvindate mahat // BhS_36.315 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10255: svāni karmāṇi kurvāṇaṃ taṃ janāḥ kurvate priyam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10260: loṣṭhamardī tṛṇacchedī nakhakhādī ca yo naraḥ // BhS_36.321 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10270: janmadvayantu vai mūḍhāśśūdratāṃ yānti te narāḥ // BhS_36.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10272: sa pūtigandhasaṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī caiva bhaveddhruvam // BhS_36.327 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10274: jātakaṃ mṛtakaṃ vāpi yasyāśaucaṃ vidhīyate // BhS_36.328 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10283: upanīto vasenmā vā tathā gurukule kramāt /
GR14bhrgus_u:10294: yastu devagṛhadvāre prasārya caraṇau kvacit // BhS_36.338 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10301: tatassūkaratāṃ prāpya janmāni nava pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10302: kliśyate bahubhiḥ kaṣṭairna śayīta harergṛhe // BhS_36.342 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10304: devālaye viśeṣeṇa prākāre vāpi mūḍhadhīḥ // BhS_36.343 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10306: sapta pañca ca janmāni tato mānuṣatāṃ vrajet // BhS_36.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10308: sa bhaveddurmanā dīno pretya ceha ca janmani // BhS_36.345 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10312: āsanāni tvasaṃkhyāni devāgāre na cācaret // BhS_36.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10316: savyaṃ khūlaṃ sukhaṃ caiva gomukhaṃ garuḍaṃ tathā // BhS_36.349 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10318: kuñjaraṃ kukkuṭaṃ nāgaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ kraiñcaṃ ca kūrmakam // BhS_36.350 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10320: yonyāsanaṃ vāsakaṃ ca dhīraṃ padmāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10322: tripadaṃ hastikarṇaṃ ca hemamardhāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.352 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10324: anyāni śāstrasiddhāni yāni santi viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.353 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10326: bhuñjīyāddevatāgāre yaḥ pāpassa tu durmanāḥ // BhS_36.354 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10327: kukṣirogārdito bhūtvā janmāni daśa pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10330: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa sa bhavennindito janaḥ // BhS_36.356 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10334: āpośanaṃ tu kṛtvaiva yadadyādbhojanaṃ tutat // BhS_36.358 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10338: sa gacchennarakān krūrān yāvanta udabindavaḥ // BhS_36.360 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10340: niveditaṃ tu devasya devasyāgre viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.361 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10349: niveditaṃ tu devasya saṃtuṣṭyaisvasya tasya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10350: tasya tuṣyati deveśa ādātā tu vipadyate // BhS_36.366 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10354: na jātu pāvayennaiva pāvayetpāvayenna tu // BhS_36.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10357: tena bhuktaṃ bhavetpāpaṃ dātureva na saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10362: pretya sṛgālatāṃ yānti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.372 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10364: caṇḍālo jāyate pretya kṣudhitaśca carenmuhuḥ // BhS_36.373 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10365: vikrīṇate tu ye viprā vāṇijye dattacakṣuṣaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10369: kaṇamannasya vāna syāttapyante tatra te janāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10370: ye gṛhītvā tadannādi bhuñjate kṣudhitā janāḥ // BhS_36.376 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10372: annaṃ prāṇā manuṣyāṇāṃ sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_36.377 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10374: annaṃ vikrīṇate ye tu prāṇavikrayiṇaḥ smṛtāḥ // BhS_36.378 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10380: sa nidhiṃ puratassiddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣati kākiṇīm // BhS_36.381 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10384: sā hānistanmamahacchidraṃ sā bhrāntissā tu vikriyā // BhS_36.383 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10388: magneneva mahāsiṃdhau hateneva ca vātyayā // BhS_36.385 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10392: tasmāddevagṛhaṃ gatvā naro nānyaparo bhavet // BhS_36.387 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10394: sa sarvo 'pi mudhā proktomithyetyeke vadantitam // BhS_36.388 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10395: na hi devasya purataḥ kvacidapyanṛtaṃ vadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10396: satyasvarūpī bhagavān satyaṃ tasmaina gūhayet // BhS_36.389 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10397: satyameva paraṃ brahma satyameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10398: satyameva paro yajñassatyameva paraṃ śrutam // BhS_36.390 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10399: satyaṃ deveṣu jāgarti satyaṃ dharmataroḥ phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10401: ādyo vidhiśca vidyā ca sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10402: satyaṃ yajñantathā vedāssatyā devī sarasvatī // BhS_36.392 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10408: satyaṃ tu vadato loke tulitaṃ syānna saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.395 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10409: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā kṛtam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10412: satyamāhuḥparaṃ dharmaṃ satyamāhuḥ paraṃ padam // BhS_36.397 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10413: satyamāhuḥ paraṃ brahma tasmātsatyaṃ na lobhayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10418: vaktavyaṃ ca sadā satyaṃ na satyādvidyate param // BhS_36.400 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10420: snātavyaṃ manasā yuktaistatsnānaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam // BhS_36.401 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10421: devārthe vā parārthe vā putrārthe vā ''tmane tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10422: ye 'nṛtaṃ nābhibhāṣante te svargaṃ yāntimānavāḥ // BhS_36.402 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10427: parīkṣante ca sarvāsu daśāsu puruṣaṃ sadā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10430: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa te praṇaśyanti sānvayam // BhS_36.406 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10434: te yānti narakaṃ pāpā jāyante nīcayoniṣu // BhS_36.408 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10436: tathānte krūrā nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.409 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10438: te 'pi tittiritāṃ bhūtvā jāyante janmapañcakam // BhS_36.410 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10442: asārāṇi tu śāstrāṇi bhūyāṃsi pṛthivītale // BhS_36.412 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10444: teṣu śāstreṣu ye jātāśśāstrārthāśca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.413 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10446: citraśilpā na saṃdeho narastena na mucyate // BhS_36.414 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10447: sā vidyā yā hariṃ stauti sā kriyā yattadarcanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10448: yā nyā yadanyadakhilaṃ duṣṭodarkā hi jīvikā // BhS_36.415 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10449: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā śāstrārthairnī rasairnaraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10451: viśālaṃ vāṅmayaṃ sarvaṃ sṛṣṭvā sraṣṭā hariḥ prabhuḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10457: pāṭhanaṃ lekhanādyaṃ ca naiva kuryādgṛhe hareḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10460: yastu devagṛhaṃ gatvā roditi praṇayādyathā // BhS_36.421 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10461: duḥkhitaḥ stauti vā devaṃ tatsyānmānasikaṃ malam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10462: nirvāṇaparamaṃ sthānaṃ mlānena manasā tu yaḥ // BhS_36.422 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10463: sevate sa na jānāti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10464: nārī vā puruṣo vāpi gatvā devagṛhaṃ kvacit // BhS_36.423 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10469: prāpya tit tiritāṃ kālaṃ vasiṣyanti ciraṃ bhuvi /
GR14bhrgus_u:10470: naivātra hiṃsāṃ kurvīta prāṇināṃ duḥkhadāṃ kvacit // BhS_36.426 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10475: kāmakrodhau ca saṃyamya tataḥ siddhimavāpnu te /
GR14bhrgus_u:10477: ātmanassukhamanvicchan sa pretya na sukhī bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10478: ātmopamastu bhūteṣu yo vaibhavati pūruṣaḥ // BhS_36.430 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10484: prakhyāpane ca dāne ca sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriye // BhS_36.433 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10486: ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā devāḥ praśaṃsanti viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.434 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10488: karmaṇā na naraḥ kurvan hiṃsāṃ jātu vicakṣaṇaḥ, // BhS_36.435 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10489: vācā ca manasā caiva tato duḥkhātpramucyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10492: yathā sarvaścatuṣpādvai tribhiḥ pādairna tiṣṭhati // BhS_36.437 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10496: evaṃ lokeṣvahiṃsā tu nirdiṣṭādharmataḥ purā // BhS_36.439 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10498: yatsarveṣviha bhūteṣu dayāhiṃsātmikā tu yā // BhS_36.440 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10499: na bhayaṃ vidyate jātu narasyeha dayāvataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10502: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtāni dadatīti jagau śrutiḥ // BhS_36.442 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10503: kṣataṃ ca patitaṃ caiva skhalitaṃ klinnamāhatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10504: sarvabhūtāni rakṣanti sameṣu viṣameṣu ca // BhS_36.443 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10505: nainaṃ vyālamṛgā ghnanti na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10506: mucyate bhayakāleṣu mokṣayedyo bhaye parān // BhS_36.444 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10507: prāṇadānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:10508: na hyātmanaḥ priyakaraṃ kiṃ cidastīha niścitam // BhS_36.445 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10510: mṛtyukāle hi bhūtānāṃ sadyo jāyeta vepathuḥ // BhS_36.446 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10516: hanyamānāśca dṛśyante vivaśā ghātukā narāḥ // BhS_36.449 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10518: ākramya māryamāṇāśca trāsyantyanye punaḥ punaḥ // BhS_36.450 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10524: ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānamahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ // BhS_36.453 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10526: ahiṃsā paramaṃ mitramahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham // BhS_36.454 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10527: sarvayajñeṣu vā dānaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu vā plutam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10530: ahiṃsrassarvabhūtānāṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā // BhS_36.456 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10534: dhānyānyapi na hiṃseta yassa bhūyādahiṃsakaḥ // BhS_36.458 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10537: tapyamāne śarīre tu śarīre cendriyāṇi tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:10538: tiṣṭhanti svavaśe tasya nṛpāṇāmiva kiṅkarāḥ // BhS_36.460 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10540: indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena dānena ca damena ca // BhS_36.461 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10549: pītvā ca bhakṣayitvā ca upavāsavrataṃ caret // BhS_36.466 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10551: na prāśnīyādvimūḍhātmā rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet // BhS_36.467 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10552: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā vivadeta naraḥ kvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:10553: na tat sthānaṃ vivādasya tasmāttaṃ dūrata styajet // BhS_36.468 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10554: mano 'navasthitaṃ yasya sa nālaṃ pūjitaṃ harim /
GR14bhrgus_u:10555: yasyaiva nirmalaṃ cittaṃ sor'hassarveṣu karmasu // BhS_36.469 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10559: na badhnāti padaṃ haṃsaḥ kadācitkardamāṃbhasi // BhS_36.471 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10560: na yogyā mādhavaṃ stotuṃ vāgduṣṭā cānṛtādinā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10567: aśikṣayaiva manasaḥ prāyo lokaśca vañcyate // BhS_36.475 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10571: kruddhaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkaḥ kruddho hanyādgurūnapi // BhS_36.477 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10575: vācyāvācyaṃ prakupito na vicānāti karhi cit // BhS_36.479 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10577: yassamutpatitaṃ krodhaṃ kṣamayā tu nirasyati // BhS_36.480 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10578: yathoragastvacaṃ jīrṇāṃ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10581: parāpavādaṃ na brūyānnāpriyaṃ ca kadā cana // BhS_36.482 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10585: sa eva bhagavān devassarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiyuk // BhS_36.484 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10588: iti saṃcintya bhūyo 'pi sarveṣvapi ca jantuṣu /
GR14bhrgus_u:10593: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ na daivaṃ tasya mṛṣyati // BhS_36.488 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10595: devatāmandiraṃ prāpya kāleṣvanyeṣu vā tathā // BhS_36.489 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10599: maryādāsu sa tiṣṭhanti sa doṣaḥ strīṣu garhitaḥ // BhS_36.491 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10601: striyo hi mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.492 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10605: pāpīyaso narān yadvai tyaktalajjā bhajantitāḥ // BhS_36.494 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10606: strīyaṃ hi yaḥ prārthayate sannikarṣaṃ ca gacchatir /
GR14bhrgus_u:10607: iṣacca kurute sevāṃ tamevecchanti yoṣitaḥ // BhS_36.495 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10611: rūpavantaṃ virūpaṃ vā pumānityeva bhuñjate // BhS_36.497 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10618: paṅguṣvanyeṣu kuṣṭheṣu ye cānye kutsitā narāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10621: apyanyonyaṃ pravartantena hi tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu // BhS_36.502 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10625: vadhabandhabhayāccāpi svayaṃ guptā bhavanti tāḥ // BhS_36.504 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10627: prājasya puruṣasyeva yathā bhāvās tathā strīyaḥ // BhS_36.505 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10631: dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ hyanyaṃ yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // BhS_36.507 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10633: rakṣitāraṃ na mṛṣyanti svabhartāramasat striyaḥ // BhS_36.508 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10637: kṣuradhārā viṣaḥ sarpo vahnirityekataḥ striyaḥ // BhS_36.510 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10639: na cāsāṃ mucyate kaścitpuruṣo hastamāgataḥ // BhS_36.511 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10641: śaṃbarasya ca yā māyā yā māyā namucerapi // BhS_36.512 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10643: hasantaṃ prahasantyetā rudantaṃ prarudanti ca // BhS_36.513 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10645: yadi jihmā sahasraṃ syājjīvecca śaradāṃ śatam // BhS_36.514 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10647: uśanā veda yacchāstraṃ yacca veda bṛhaspatiḥ // BhS_36.515 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10648: strībuddhyā na viśiṣyeta surakṣyā na bhavantitāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10650: iti yāstāḥ kathaṃ rakṣyāḥ puruṣairdurbharāḥ striyaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10652: apāstāśca tathā sadyo vikurvanti manaḥ striyaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10653: na ca strīṇāṃ kriyāḥ kāściditi dharmo vyavasthitaḥ // BhS_36.518 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10656: durvāgarbhavaṃ ratiṃ caiva dadau strībhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10657: na tāsāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ śakyaṃ kartuṃ puṃsāṃ kathaṃ cana // BhS_36.520 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10659: vācā ca vadhabandhairvā kleśairvā vividhaistathā // BhS_36.521 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10660: na śakyā rakṣitāṃ nāryastā hi nityamasaṃyatāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10663: nātaḥ paraṃ hi nārīṇāṃ vidyate ca kadā cana // BhS_36.523 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10666: na ca dahyanti gacchantyaḥ sutaptairapi pāṃsubhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10667: nānilo 'gnirna varuṇo na cānye tridaśāntathā // BhS_36.525 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10668: priyāḥ strīṇāṃ yathā kāmo ratiśīlā hi yoṣitaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10669: sahasrekila nārīṇāṃ prāpyetaikā kadā cana // BhS_36.526 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10671: naitā jānanti pitaraṃ na kulaṃ na ca mātaram // BhS_36.527 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10672: na bhrātṝnna ca bhartāraṃ na ca putrān na devarān /
GR14bhrgus_u:10673: līlāyantyaḥ kulaṃ ghnanti kūlānīva saridvarāḥ // BhS_36.528 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10675: na te sukhāya mantavyāḥ svedajā iva bindavaḥ // BhS_36.529 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10679: tādṛśaṃ strīṣu vijñeyaṃ nādhikaṃ tāsu vidyate // BhS_36.531 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10681: tadvat strīṣvapi vijñeyaṃ na saukhyaṃ paramārthataḥ // BhS_36.532 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10683: tādṛśaṃ strīṣu vijñeyaṃ nādhikaṃ tāsu vidyate // BhS_36.533 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10685: tathā devotsavādīnāṃ sevā tāsāṃ niṣidhyate // BhS_36.534 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10686: na hi svatantrato yoṣijjātu gacchet sthalāntaram /
GR14bhrgus_u:10687: na hi nirmimate vṛddhā līlayā devamandirān // BhS_36.535 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10689: anugacchetpitā bhrātā bhartā putro 'tha vā yadi // BhS_36.536 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10697: tasmāt strīṣu na kartavyaḥ prasaṃgo devatākṛhe // BhS_36.540 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10700: na hīdṛśamanāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10703: yāvanto romakūpāḥ syuḥ strīṇāṃ gātreṣu nirmitāḥ // BhS_36.543 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10712: sa tu caṇḍālatāṃ prāpya jāyate janmanāṃ śatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10720: iti devagṛhaṃ gantuṃ vyādhito naiva cārhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:10723: arcituṃ sevituṃ cāpi dātuṃ dravyacayaṃ tathā // BhS_36.553 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10726: janmāni nava pañcāpi jāyate malabhuk kṛmiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10732: uṣṇīṣī na ca seveta naiva pāṇau dhṛtāyudhaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10735: śvitrī saṃjāyate mūḍho navajanmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.559 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10737: caṇḍālayonitāṃ yāti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.560 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10739: tvaṅkāro vā vadho veti vidvatsu na niśiṣyate // BhS_36.561 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10741: paranindā ca śāstrasya parasya tu vinindanam // BhS_36.562 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10743: nindayā vai pareṣāṃ tu ninditāste punassmṛtāḥ // BhS_36.563 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10745: tathā parastutiṃ caiva vidhinā saṃtyajennaraḥ // BhS_36.564 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10746: paraḥ parātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ procyate tu yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10747: tadagre 'nyasya devasya na stutiṃ stāvayennaraḥ // BhS_36.565 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10749: pūjayedyadi manyeta pūjārhaṃ vāsa naśyati // BhS_36.566 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10757: śaktau satyāṃ viśeṣeṇa yastulobhādinā naraḥ // BhS_36.570 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10759: na tasya vidyate puṇyaṃ sa tūcchāstraṃ vravartate // BhS_36.571 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10764: tasmātkurvīta yatnena śaktilobhaṃ na jātu cit /
GR14bhrgus_u:10765: anyathā yadi kurvāṇaḥ phalaṃ naiva prapadyate // BhS_36.574 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10767: viṣaṃ prāśnāti sammūḍho yassvasmai pacate naraḥ // BhS_36.575 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10773: viṣṇorniveditaṃ yastu na bhuṅkte manujādhamaḥ // BhS_36.578 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10781: yā ca bhūyāṃsi loke 'sminnutpādayati santatam // BhS_36.582 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10787: navāni kāle jātāni sasyādīni viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.585 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10791: teyāntinarakān ghorān kṛtaghnā yāntiyān bahūn // BhS_36.587 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10793: navaṃ sasyaṃ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ dadhikṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu // BhS_36.588 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10797: ucchiṣṭa manyadevasya yo devāya nivedayet // BhS_36.590 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10798: so 'pi caṇḍālatāṃ prāpya naśyedeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10799: niveditaṃ tu devasya ya ucchiṣṭena yojayet // BhS_36.591 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10801: sa pāpī janmasāhasraṃ śvānayoniṣu jāyate // BhS_36.592 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10802: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā pṛṣṭī kṛtyāsanaṃ caret /
GR14bhrgus_u:10807: sa hi sarveśvara śśeṣī yastatrāste ramādhavaḥ // BhS_36.595 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10811: yastu devagṛhaṃ prāptān vaiṣṇavān bhagavatpriyān // BhS_36.597 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10821: na sukhaṃ na ca saubhāgyaṃ yenātmāntūyate svayam // BhS_36.602 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10823: tato janmaśataṃ prāpya mṛgayonau viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.603 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10826: sa tu tit tiritāṃ yāti navajanmāni pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10831: antarāle tathā yeṣāṃ sthānaṃ tattu pravakṣyate // BhS_36.607 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10833: te dvijāstat strīyaścāpi sevante tatra saṃgatāḥ // BhS_36.608 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10839: gopurādbāhyataḥ sthitvā sevante mandiraṃ hareḥ // BhS_36.611 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10843: caṇḍālayonitāmeti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.613 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10845: sa bhaveddevahā satyaṃ jāyate śvādiyoniṣu, // BhS_36.614 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10847: karmāṇi svecchayā kuryātso 'pi syāddevahā naraḥ // BhS_36.615 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10849: anādṛtya ca ye yānti te narāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ // BhS_36.616 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10852: deveṣu goṣu vipreṣu devāgāreṣu caiva hi /
GR14bhrgus_u:10857: sevārthināṃ sakāśāttu balātkāreṇa yaḥ prabhuḥ // BhS_36.620 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10858: gṛhṇīyāttukaraṃ sadyaḥ patetsa saha tena ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10860: patraṃ phalaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā svarṇaṃ vāsāṃsi cetarat /
GR14bhrgus_u:10862: svayaṃ vāpyupayuñjīta sa pāpī narakaṃ vrajet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10869: arcakā eva gṛhṇīyuḥ pratibadhnīta netaraḥ // BhS_36.626 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10871: akāle sevituṃ cecchetso 'pi yāsyati durgatim // BhS_36.627 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10872: atha vā sevituṃ cecchetkāraṇenāpi kena cit /
GR14bhrgus_u:10873: ukteṣveva tu kāleṣu seveta matimānnaraḥ // BhS_36.628 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10884: karmabhūmau nṛṇāṃ janma karmāpi vibhalaṃ dhruvam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10885: yo gurau mānuṣaṃ bhāvaṃ śilābhāvaṃ ca daivate // BhS_36.634 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10887: pūjakeṣu ca pūjāyāṃ nīrasaṃ bhāvameti saḥ // BhS_36.635 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10888: sarvadhā ninditavyo hi jīvitaṃ tasya niṣphalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10889: kṣamāmantraḥ atha vakṣye viśeṣaṇa kṣamāmantravidhiṃ param // BhS_36.636 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10890: apacāreṣu sarveṣu yaṃ japtvā mucyate naraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10891: aparādhaḥ kṛto yena jānatā svavaśena saḥ // BhS_36.637 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10895: namo namo namaste 'stu namaste 'stu namo namaḥ // BhS_36.639 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10897: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.640 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10899: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.641 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10901: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.642 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10903: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.643 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10904: snāsyatā japatā vāpi yajatā juhvatā mayā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10905: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.644 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10907: aparādhāḥ kṛtā ye tān kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.645 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10909: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.646 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10911: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.647 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10913: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.648 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10915: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.649 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10923: prasīdatu ram mahyaṃ tava vakṣaḥsthalālayā // BhS_36.653 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10932: guhyādguhyatamo gopyassarvadā gurubhiḥ sadā iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sihitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:10936: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaśca kaliśceti caturyugam // BhS_37.1 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10937: kṛtameva ca kartavyaṃ tasmin kāle yadīpsitam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10938: na tatradharmāḥsīdanti na ca kṣīyantivai prajāḥ // BhS_37.2 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10941: nānūyā nāpi ruditaṃ na darpo na ca paiśunam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10942: na vigraho na vidveṣona mithyā nāpi vañcanam // BhS_37.4 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10943: na bhayaṃ na ca santāpo na lobho na ca mānitā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10946: viṣṇussarvātmako devaḥ śuklo nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhS_37.6 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10960: raktatāṃ tu samabhyeti harirnārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // BhS_37.13 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10964: yato dharmapade vṛddhā dvāparaṃ pratipedare // BhS_37.15 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10970: prajā dānaparā bhūtvā dānaṃ śaṃsanti santatam // BhS_37.18 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10977: padenaikena vai dharmaḥ pravarteta kalau yuge /
GR14bhrgus_u:10980: yaḥ kaścidatra dharmātmā kriyoyogarato bhavet // BhS_37.23 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10990: ghore kaliyuge prāpte dvijā vedaparāṅmukhāḥ // BhS_37.28 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11004: uttamā nīcatāṃ yānti nīcāścottamatāṃ tathā // BhS_37.35 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11014: duśśīlā duṣṭaśīleṣu kariṣyanti spṛhāṃ striyaḥ // BhS_37.40 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11016: vācālāśca bhaviṣyantikalau prāpte sadā striyaḥ // BhS_37.41 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11030: ekavarṇā bhaviṣyanti varṇāścatvāra eva ca // BhS_37.48 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11033: maitrī parajane bhūyādvairaṃ ca svajane bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:11034: putrāḥ pitṛṣu jīvatsu mriyante ca tadagrataḥ // BhS_37.50 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11036: tyakṣyantihi priyān prāṇān haniṣyanti svabāndhavān // BhS_37.51 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11044: bhaviṣyanti durātmānaḥ śūdrāḥ pravrajitās tathā // BhS_37.55 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11050: bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpte śūdramārga pravartinaḥ // BhS_37.58 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11051: hartāro na ca dātārobhaviṣyanti kalau yuge /
GR14bhrgus_u:11058: yācakāḥ piśunāścaiva bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // BhS_37.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11062: vadanti vācā dharmāṃśca cetasā pāpalolupāḥ // BhS_37.64 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11066: bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpti rājāno mlecchajātayaḥ // BhS_37.66 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11069: na śiṣyo na guruḥ kaścinna putro na tathā pitā /
GR14bhrgus_u:11070: na bhāryā na patistatra bhavitā sarvasaṃkaraḥ // BhS_37.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11071: kalau ca te bhaviṣyanti dhanāḍhyā api yācakāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:11074: dviṣyanti pitaraṃ putrā guruṃ śiṣyādviṣanti ca // BhS_37.70 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11075: patiṃ ca vanitā dveṣṭi kalau prāptena saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:11084: na kanyāṃ yācate kaścinna ca kanyāprado naraḥ // BhS_37.75 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11086: prāyaśaḥ kṛpaṇānāṃ ca bandhūnāṃ ca tadhā dvijāḥ // BhS_37.76 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11088: na yakṣyanti na hoṣyantina tapasyanti vai janāḥ // BhS_37.77 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11089: naiva dāsyanti dānādi nār'cayiṣyanti vā harim /
GR14bhrgus_u:11091: apātreṣveva dānāni kurvanti ca tathā narāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:11093: na kurvanti tathā viprāḥ snānaśaucādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:11097: viṣṇubhaktiparaṃ na syānmanaḥ kasyāpi jātu cit /
GR14bhrgus_u:11098: devapūjāparaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve parihasanti ca // BhS_37.82 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11100: tān parityajya mohena narāḥ kālabalātkṛtāḥ // BhS_37.83 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11104: dānayajña japādīnāṃ vikrīṇante phalaṃ dvijāḥ // BhS_37.85 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11108: śūdrānna pānaniratāḥ śūdraprāyā bhavanti ca // BhS_37.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11110: pramadāḥ keśaśūlinyo bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // BhS_37.88 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11116: kālena balinā sarvaṃ naśyatyāyurbalaṃ smṛtiḥ // BhS_37.91 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11122: avṛttau cāpi daurbalyaṃ pāṇḍitye cāphalaṃ vacaḥ // BhS_37.94 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11126: itthaṃ kaliyuge prāpte dharmassarvo 'pi jīryate // BhS_37.96 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11127: yadā māyānṛtaṃ tandrā nidrā hiṃsā viṣāyanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:11128: śoko moho bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalistāmasaḥsmṛtaḥ // BhS_37.97 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11138: yauvane vārdhake caiva maraṇe cāti dāruṇe // BhS_37.102 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11141: ye cātrāgantukāḥ proktāste tu śāmyanti bheṣajaiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:11145: nauṣadhaṃ na tapo dānaṃ na mantrāna ca bāndhavāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:11149: nāsti mṛtyusamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti mṛtyusamaṃ bhayam /
GR14bhrgus_u:11152: yadduḥkhaṃ maraṇe jantorna tasyeha samaṃ kvacit // BhS_37.109 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11153: maṇḍūka iva sarpeṇa grasyate mṛtyunā jagat /
GR14bhrgus_u:11158: khaṭvāyā vāñchate bhūmiṃ bhūmeḥ khaṭvāṃ tato mahīm // BhS_37.112 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11162: nakhāgraiśca spṛśan bhūmiṃ kālapāśena karṣitaḥ // BhS_37.114 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11166: dehabhedena yaḥ puṃsāṃ viyogaḥ karmasaṃkṣayāt // BhS_37.116 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11168: jāyate mriyate caivaṃ karmabhiḥ svayamārjitaiḥ // BhS_37.117 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11174: duḥkhaṃ tatsaṃsmṛtiṃ prāptaṃ karoti mama vepathum // BhS_37.120 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11184: athāpi nātra bibhyanti vaiṣṇavā bhagavatpriyāḥ // BhS_37.125 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11186: te viṣṇusadṛśā jñeyā na hi tān bādhate kaliḥ // BhS_37.126 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11190: chinatti vaiṣṇavīṃ māyāṃ keśavārādhane rataḥ // BhS_37.128 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11194: śubhaṃ karmaiva kartadyaṃ tatprasādāya mānavaiḥ, // BhS_37.130 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11200: yaddhyānaṃ kevalaṃ proktaṃ śāstre kvacidanāśrayam // BhS_37.133 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11204: sarvatra kramavān yatnaḥkāryo naicchaiva kevalā // BhS_37.135 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11206: nirākāretu yā bhaktyā pūjeṣṭā dhyānameva vā // BhS_37.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11210: na ca rūpaṃ vinā dovo dhyātuṃ kenāpi śakyate // BhS_37.138 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11216: paraṃ devamupāsīta muktaye vā phalāyavā // BhS_37.141 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11221: sākāre 'smin kṛtā pūjā stutirvā dhyānameva vā /
GR14bhrgus_u:11222: vidhinā śāstradṛṣṭena tasminneva kṛtā bhavet // BhS_37.144 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11230: jagadāvaraṇaṃ krūraṃ tamaḥ puñjaṃ haniṣyati // BhS_37.148 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11244: svayaṃvyaktaṃ parañjyotiḥ paraṃ brahma parātparam // BhS_37.155 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11247: avanamya ca mūrdhānaṃ gṛhīṣyati gale srajam /
GR14bhrgus_u:11249: svayaṃ sārdhaṃ kumāreṇa havīṃṣi ca bhujiṣyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:11258: sthāpayiṣyati viṣṇvarcāṃ grāme grāme gṛhe gṛhe // BhS_37.162 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11259: purāṇi ca janāvāsā gṛhāṇi gṛhiṇāṃ tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:11263: ihaiva gṛhiṇāṃ bhūyaḥ prasaṃga iha mantraṇam /
GR14bhrgus_u:11276: iha gītaṃ nṛttamiha vādyaṃ śrutimanoharam // BhS_37.171 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11277: iha pratiṣṭhā devasya iha ca dvijabhojanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:11284: adya devasya kuryanti snapanaṃ kalaśaiśśataiḥ // BhS_37.175 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11286: adya cātā jaganmātā phālgune revatī tithau // BhS_37.176 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11292: gandhotsavo 'dya kriyate paurṇamāsī kadā dinam // BhS_37.179 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11293: kadā caikādaśī puṇyā kadā vā dvādaśītidhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:11297: kadā jyeṣṭhotsavo bhūyātkadā vā pūrṇimā śubhā /
GR14bhrgus_u:11298: prapotsavaḥ kadā bhūyādāṣāḍhī ca bhaviṣyati // BhS_37.182 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11299: kadā ca śravaṇaṃ bhūyānnakṣatraṃ yatra mārutiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:11301: kadā ca śrāvaṇī bhūyādyatra nārāyaṇo hariḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:11304: kadā bhādrapado māsastatra caikādaśī bhavet // BhS_37.185 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11306: tiladhenuṃ pradāsyanti yatra devasya sannidhau // BhS_37.186 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11310: kadā vā kārtikomāso bhaviṣyati haripriyaḥ // BhS_37.188 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11311: dīpāropo bhavettatra kadā vā kārtikī śubhā /
GR14bhrgus_u:11314: kadā vā gajayātrā syātkadā vīśādhirohaṇam // BhS_37.190 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11320: kadā vā tulasīṃ puṇyāmarpitāṃ tasya pādayoḥ // BhS_37.193 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11326: ityādikāḥ kathāstatra bhaviṣyanti prajāsu ca // BhS_37.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11328: arcane vāsudevasya bhaviṣyanti ratā narāḥ // BhS_37.197 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11332: idaṃ ca bhagavacchāstraṃ cirasthāyi kariṣyati // BhS_37.199 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11336: sameṣyati paraṃ sthānaṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // BhS_37.201 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11338: tadā harirmahāvīraḥ kalkī nāma bhaviṣyati // BhS_37.202 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11341: yaḥ paṭhec chruṇuyādvāpi so 'pi yāsyati sadgatim /
GR14bhrgus_u:11344: dhyāyan kṛtayuge viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ dāpare yajan // BhS_37.205 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11372: ityārṣe śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ caturviṃśatsahānrikāyāṃ sahitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GR14bhrgus_u:11374: śrī vikhanasamahāgurave namaḥ śrautasmārtādikaṃ karma nikhilaṃ yena sūtritam tasmai samastavedārthavide vikhanase namaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:11375: jayatyātmeśvarosni dradhyāna saudhapriyātithiḥ śrīmatpatrapurīvāsaḥ śrīrāmassītayā gṛhī.
